title: Cayin - iDAP-6
description:
The Short Story

Designed in China

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Bluetooth with aptX

DESCRIPTION

Convenience in an Audio Player

With the iDAP6 you can get easy and quick access to portable devices like SD card and USB thumb drive OTG with 1A current. It can handle 2.5" HDD directly.

Connect Anywhere, Any time
You can get LAN connection through WiFi or with the Ethernet cable enable network-based applications. Samba the file/music sharing with NAS or PCs in LAN. Pushed content from DLNA library (DLNA Render) Pushed music from Apple devices (Airplay)

Extraordinary Music Player

The iDAP6 has three USB Audio output or USB storage. Along with the regular RCA (coaxial) and Toslink (optical) comes the professionally used applications BNC (coaxial)

Comprehensive and Technically advanced

The iDAP6 comes with AES/EBU which is recommended by studio professionals and is the most reliable digital interface. The best alternative lower jitter, delivered through HDIM as high quality cables-I2S which is the native digital audio for signal transmission.

Access
You can connect your iDAP-6 with your phone via Bluetooth as it supports HiByLink. You can even control playback of iDAP-6 remotely through a touch screen graphical interface. You can also share files, mobile app will read the file headers and facilitate features which is originally not available like searching, playlists, file management etc. It is compatible with off-the-shelf Bluetooth remote control.

All-New UI Design
The iDAP-6 is designed with the All-New UI design for the music playback. It is intuitive, visible, comprehensive and self-explained. It has multi-layered to best-fit the 3.95" AMOLED screen. All information are well organized and are properly presented.

Multi-Function Knob
With the knob on the iDAP-6 you can easily control all features. Rotate left and right to browse and press enter to select your choice.

Dual Bluetooth 4.1

The iDAP-6 can be used as wireless digital transport or playback to Bluetooth headphones. You just have to accept audio signal form the paired device and it can function as a wireless interface to a sound system.

The i-Series Family

The i-Series has almost the same look and feel with matching material and finishing. The iDAC-6, iHA-6 and iDAP-6 can be used as complete Desktop Trio system or you can mix and match them with different audio equipments.

Hardware Highlights
Two extremely low-noise high-precision Femtosecond Crystal Oscilallators with RMS jitter below 0.1ps@10hz-1MHz and phase noise below -166dBc/Hz@1MHz offset. High precision low jitter digital transmission is the base of high quality digital playback. It is how we deliver a natural, non-digital and musical sound to your audio system. They designed and manufactured the toroidal transformers in-house. It is securely shielded and will provide low-noise, high efficient power for iDAP-6 circuit. They use NICHICON electrolytic capacitors from Japan in their power supply circuit. This improves the transparency of the system, and display the detail and layering effortlessly.

title: Audeze - LCD-MX4
description:
Designed & Made in USA

Flat Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

3 Years Warranty On Drivers

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Replaceable Mini XLR Cables

DESCRIPTION

TRUSTED BY AUDIO PROFESSIONALS WORLD-WIDE

The LCD Reference Series is trusted by audio professionals all over the world for its neutral and accurate sound. The Audeze LCD-MX4 is one such headphone that allows you to mix and master with its transparency and studio-quality sound. It's engineered using premium materials at Audeze's factory in California, USA.

ACCURATE SOUND REPRODUCTION WITH ADVANCED PLANAR MAGNETIC DRIVERS

Hear every detail with microscopic clarity and transparency thanks to the LCD-MX4's planar magnetic drivers. The ultra-thin diaphragms and powerful Neodymium magnets deliver a magnetic force of 1.5 Tesla resulting in fast transient responses as well as a frequency range of 10Hz and 50kHz. You'll be able to identify and localize each & every element in the track with ease.

DESIGNED FOR LONG USE IN THE STUDIO

The LCD-MX4 is designed to be used for long hours in the studio. Hence, it is significantly lighter than the other LCD models. It is crafted from carbon fibre and lightweight magnesium. Soft memory foam earpads add to the comfort.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

The LCD-MX4 represents the fusion of the Flagship series and Reference lines. Analytical and Musical.

Yes, it does require amplification. You can check out our collection of amplifiers and DACs here.

No, these headphones are not meant for gaming.

title: Headphone Zone - SmartCase
description:
DESCRIPTION
When you fumble for your earphones, they have chances of getting entangled, grimy and dirty because of the way they are placed in your bag - they are hard to find when you are in a hurry.
We know you are on the go all the time, be it traveling across states, or just commuting across streets. Hence, we give you the SmartCase to carry your earphones smartly everywhere. It guards, carries, stores and protects your earphones from dirt and grime, and keeps them untangled. Also, the silicone build of the SmartCase makes it easy to FIT ANYWHERE!
Presenting Headphone Zone's SmartCase. It keeps your earphones safe, clean and untangled. You can wrap earphones in it and keep them and they don’t budge because the silicone padding around it seals perfectly.
These cases come in a range of vibrant and youthful colour combinations and is perfect for every type of personality out there. Choose your favorite one!

Easy to Use
The SmartCases have a minimalistic design which allows for easy and user friendly usage. All you have to do is wrap the earphones around the lid and then close the lid gently after your earphones have been wrapped and contained in the body.
WATER AND DIRT PROOF
The silicone encasing is dirt resistant and doesn’t allow your earphones to be bothered by surrounding grime. Also, it is splash-proof and perfect for carrying them around during the Indian monsoon.

EASY TO LOCATE

DESCRIPTION

A HEADPHONE AS UNIQUE AND AWESOME AS YOU!

Experience pure luxury in terms of looks and sound with the Meze 99 Classics. This headphone has been lovingly handcrafted from wood and the satin-finished wood grain makes each headphone unique, just like your fingerprint. With these, Meze has worked to change the perception of headphones from being seen as technical devices or cheap plastic accessories to a mature product that you'll fall in love with.

A RICH NATURAL SOUND

Enjoy a crisp, balanced sound with the Meze 99 Classics. The 40mm neodymium drivers offer a clear, undistorted sound. Just sit back and put these on to enjoy the gorgeous sound of plucked strings, upbeat grooves or thumping beats that's natural and lifelike. In addition, the snug medium density memory foam keeps away noise while offering superior noise isolation.

HIGH-QUALITY AND LUXURY IN EVERY ELEMENT

Apart from wood, the 99 Classics also use cast zinc and manganese spring steel. The headband ensures even pressure for long listening sessions. The headpad and earpads are made from PU leather. Everything is then put together using nuts and bolts. This makes the headphone fully serviceable. The entire headphone is made from only premium materials, no glue or plastic.

MADE WITH CARE USING AN EXTENSIVE PROCESS

Each Meze 99 Classics takes almost 45 days to be made. The wood used is harvested from mature trees that have reached the end of their life cycle. This ensures that there is no harm done to the environment while giving you that rich, natural sound. To further enhance the colours, the wood goes through extensive air drying and shaping by hand and CNC machines, a process that takes almost 8 hours. It then goes through sanding, lacquering, finishing, careful inspection and is finally assembled.

It guards, carries, stores and protects your earphones from dirt and grime, and keeps them untangled. Also, the silicone build of the SmartCase makes it easy to FIT ANYWHERE!
Presenting Headphone Zone's SmartCase. It keeps your earphones safe, clean and untangled. You can wrap earphones in it and keep them and they don’t budge because the silicone padding around it seals perfectly.
These cases come in a range of vibrant and youthful colour combinations and is perfect for every type of personality out there. Choose your favorite one!

Easy to Use
The SmartCases have a minimalistic design which allows for easy and user friendly usage. All you have to do is wrap the earphones around the lid and then close the lid gently after your earphones have been wrapped and contained in the body.
WATER AND DIRT PROOF
The silicone encasing is dirt resistant and doesn’t allow your earphones to be bothered by surrounding grime. Also, it is splash-proof and perfect for carrying them around during the Indian monsoon.

EASY TO LOCATE

title: Schiit - Fulla 3
description:
Designed & Made in the USA

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Ideal for Gaming

AKM AK4490 DAC Chip

Pair with Laptop via USB

Connect With USB

250mW RMS @ 32Ω Power Output

Metal Build

Volume Controls

DESCRIPTION

GET GREAT SOUND FOR MUSIC AND GAMING

Get the best of the audio & gaming worlds with the Schiit Fulla 3. It's a DAC/Amp that includes a high-quality 24-bit electret mic input. An automatic gain control makes the mic adjustment-free and easy-to-use. You can also use it as a preamp or to add power to just about any source device with its USB & jack inputs.

A HIGH-TECH PACKAGE THAT WORKS WITH JUST ABOUT EVERY HEADPHONE

The Fulla 3 houses an AKM AK4490 chipset, an Alps RK09 potentiometer, precision thin-film capacitors & resistors, high-quality filter & amp stages from Texas Instruments and more which makes it a power-packed performer that punches way above its price. It can deliver up to 400mW into 16 ohms with a low output impedance and vanishing noise floor. In other words, it works with virtually any headphone.

Expert Verdict

"The iFi Zen Dac is one of the best entry-level DACs you can buy. It sounds great, has a ton of features, and can grow with your system as your tastes evolve." Tech Radar

"Aune does good work. We all can agree, the X1S is a good DAC that offers a solid selection of possibilities. We can recommend this to middle-tier powered speaker owners foremost." Headfonics

"A practical, portable, feature-full DAC with an happily open and balanced sound. Open, detailed and tonally balanced sound with good battery life, Versatile." What Hi-Fi

SEE MORE
SEE MORE
SEE MORE
SEE MORE

FAQs

Wait a sec! This seems like a Fulla 2 with a microphone input!

That’s exactly what it is. A lot of people wanted a nice, transportable device for gaming, so we added a microphone input to Fulla 2 to make Fulla 3.

But it’s the same price as Fulla 2. What did you compromise on in order to add the mic input and keep the same price?

We have secret deals with the Chinese government, who actually make the Fulla 3 for us.

Really?

No. Duh. We design and build everything here in California, just like we've done from the very start.

So do you care to answer the question?

Sure. The reason we could add the mic input—a really nice mic input, actually, with a 24-bit AKM ADC, automatic gain control, and full USB integration, so it just shows up on your list of inputs when you plug it in—is that times have changed, and we make more products more efficiently than ever before. So it doesn’t really cost much more to add the feature.

Ah come on! What did you compromise on?

Only one thing, really: we lost the fixed DAC output of Fulla 2 in order to accommodate the mic input. Now, there’s only a variable preamp output, with a marker for typical line-level output, rather than separate fixed and variable output. We think it’s a fairly good tradeoff. You may disagree.

So otherwise this is just a Fulla 2?

Yep. But let’s review what a Fulla 2 is, before you start throwing around that ‘just’ word. A Fulla 3, like Fulla 2, is a DAC/amp flexible enough to cover pretty much all your desktop needs. It has:
A big-ass volume knob connected to a well-matched Alps RK09 pot (like we use in Magni)
A 1/8” headphone output
A 1/8” variable DAC output (so you can use it with powered monitors, or an amp without volume control)
A 1/8” stereo analog input (so you can use it as just an amp, bypassing the DAC)
A 1/8” mono electret mic input (so you can use it with most electret mics, both those attached to headphones and those that are separate)
USB micro inputs for both data/power and power alone (the second power input allows you to connect your phone charger or other 5V supply and bypass USB power.)

So how does this thing work for gaming?

Plug in your headphones and mic (usually using the TRRS-to-dual-TRS adapter supplied with the headphones), plug the Fulla 3 into your computer, select “I’m Fulla Schiit” for both audio output and mic input, and you’re set. Done.

Sounds like this is for PCs. How about for consoles?

If your console supports UAC2 (USB Audio Class 2, the standard for USB audio these days), then you’re golden. However, we haven’t tested all consoles. But for Windows 10, most Linux distros, MacOS, iOS, and Android these days, you’re set.

What about Windows 7 and 8.1?

We provide drivers for this antique version of Windows that is slated to die in January 2020, and for 8.1. Seriously, though, Windows 10 is really good. Time to move on.

Okay. Fine. Let’s talk power. Are you saying that if I plug my phone charger into the power-only USB input, that means the Fulla 3 tells my computer that it doesn’t need any power?

Yes. Or your phone, or tablet, or any other device plugged into the Data/Power USB port. Technically, Fulla 3 tells your computer or phone it needs the full 500mA a USB2 port can supply, unless you plug in a separate power USB, in which case, it tells your computer or phone that it needs 0mA.

So, also on this USB power thing, does that mean I can use a super-crazy linear supply that costs 3X as much as the Fulla 3 to get better performance?

Go back and read what you just asked. Seriously, just use your phone charger or something.

Yeah, I hear you, but I really really really want to spend a lot of money on a linear power supply that does nothing!

We understand. And you should be free to waste your money any way you'd like. But really, your super-pristine linear supply with the Regurgitson Ultraregulators isn't gonna do anything, since it's running through a switching supply anyway. You know, just like lots of other, more expensive products do...except we tell you this, and don't encourage you to throw money down the loo.

So I can use this with iDevices and Android phones with no powered hub?

Many of them, yes. As long as you have a 5V charger of reasonable quality with a micro USB connector for output. You know, like for charging phones. However, note that Android devices are highly variable—just because they're running the latest OS doesn't mean the hardware is up to the task. Some will need helper software like UAPP.

Can I use this with both headphones and powered monitors?

Yep!

Can I use this as just an amp?

Yep!

Can I use this as just a DAC?

Yep! It has variable output, with a marker for typical line-level output.

If I plug in headphones…

It automatically mutes the preamp outputs. See, we’re getting good at predicting what you’re gonna ask. Kinda like autocorrect. But with less embarrassing mistakes. We hope.

Whoa. That’s a whole lot of features! How do you do it for $99 in the USA?

By making tons of them, selling direct, and not being greedy.

Hey, I want one of these in silver, not black.

Sorry, only black is available on Fulla 3. Come to the dark side...

Why would I step up to a Hel?

Because you want more power or flexibility. Hel delivers 4x the power of Fulla 3, it has a gain switch for harder-to-drive or more sensitive headphones, it has a switchable analog input, and it has front-panel adjustable microphone gain and a stereo mic input. If any of those features are important, it might be worth $90 more than Fulla 3 for your needs.

So why would I step up to a Magni/Modi stack?

More power, more flexibility, bigger wallet, bigger desk—remember, Magni/Modi/Vali combos range from $198 to $398, and cover basic USB-powered DACs to True Multibit DACs, solid-state to tube amps. Also, they don’t provide microphone input for gaming.

So is this gonna sound great with my headphones?

For most headphones, yes. There are some headphones out there that are very hard to drive, or insanely sensitive. Check with the headphone manufacturer if you're unsure.

Is 400mW into 16 ohms a lot of power?

Well, you’re not going to arc-weld with it or anything, but it is about 10x the output power of a typical headphone jack on a computer or mobile device.

What comes in the box, besides the Fulla? Do I get a cable with this?

Yes, we supply a 3’ micro USB (to standard USB) cable. Yeah, we know Apple and some other doods are going full-nuts on USB-C. One word: adapters.

What about the 1/8” to XLR, or 1/8” to RCA, or 1/8” to 1/8”, or 1/8” to DIN, or whatever cables I need to connect to my speakers or DACs?

That’s a lot of cables. And this thing is $99. Check out Monoprice for 1/8" to dual RCA cables and all the other crazy cables you might need.

Can I use a fancier cable to get better sound?

You can do whatever you’d like, including dancing by the light of the full moon and making small, non-living sacrifices to the audiophile gods.

No, seriously.

We are being serious.

I’m asking specifically about the cable.

As long as it’s a USB 2.0-rated cable, 2m or less in length, terminated with a micro USB plug on one end, you can use it, sure.

And it’ll sound better?

Probably about as much as taping $100 bills to your headphones. Or sending the $100 bills to us. We prefer the latter.

You’re messing with me!

Just a little.

So what’s Fulla in Norse?

Fulla is a goddess, “bountiful”, and a healer. And if you’re looking to relax to some great tunes on the go, the Schiit Fulla can definitely be a bountiful healer. And that’s not fulla schiit.

Buying Guide

Best Amp/DACs for your Headphones for Beginner Audiophiles
by Shanth Swaroop May 09, 2020
There are many kinds of DACs available at different price points. Take a look at a few of the options we have in store for you and decide for yourself.

title: Headphone Zone - SmartCase
description:
DESCRIPTION
When you fumble for your earphones, they have chances of getting entangled, grimy and dirty because of the way they are placed in your bag - they are hard to find when you are in a hurry.
We know you are on the go all the time, be it traveling across states, or just commuting across streets. Hence, we give you the SmartCase to carry your earphones smartly everywhere. It guards, carries, stores and protects your earphones from dirt and grime, and keeps them untangled. Also, the silicone build of the SmartCase makes it easy to FIT ANYWHERE!
Presenting Headphone Zone's SmartCase. It keeps your earphones safe, clean and untangled. You can wrap earphones in it and keep them and they don’t budge because the silicone padding around it seals perfectly.
These cases come in a range of vibrant and youthful colour combinations and is perfect for every type of personality out there. Choose your favorite one!

Easy to Use
The SmartCases have a minimalistic design which allows for easy and user friendly usage. All you have to do is wrap the earphones around the lid and then close the lid gently after your earphones have been wrapped and contained in the body.
WATER AND DIRT PROOF
The silicone encasing is dirt resistant and doesn’t allow your earphones to be bothered by surrounding grime. Also, it is splash-proof and perfect for carrying them around during the Indian monsoon.

EASY TO LOCATE
The build and the size of the SmartCase is such that it makes it easy for you to locate it among a number of other things in your bag.
VIBRANT COLOURS
The SmartCases come in a range of vivacious and youthful colours that match each personality and their mood. You can either go for the quirky combinations or the calmer solid ones, whatever suits your personality best! Choose from colours like black, white, blue, green, yellow and pink.

The SoundMAGIC E10-series have been an award-winners for 6 years straight. Plug them in, and you'd know that right off the bat. A robust metal build, universally flexible remote and sound fine-tuned for the masses. They sound MAGIC.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

BETTERMENT OF THE BEST: THE E10C

The SoundMAGIC E10C has been designed and modelled on its predecessor the award-winning E10. Retaining everything from sound, to build and quality. The E10C offers an in-line microphone and remote that offers universal compatibility and works with Apple and Android alike.

10MM DYNAMIC DRIVERS FOR AWARD-WINNING SOUND QUALITY

Experience detailed high-quality sound with the SoundMAGIC E10C's 10mm dynamic drivers. With a powerful, precise and natural sounding bass, these in-ears sound exceptional with any music genre. Choose the right fitting eartip to experience sound output.

LIGHTWEIGHT METAL AND DURABLE CONSTRUCTION

Inspite of its all-metal construction, the E10C is extremely lightweight and comfortable. The vibrant colours this earphone comes in makes it look stylish. Just take them out of your bag and heads are sure to turn.

UNIVERSALLY COMPATIBLE 3-BUTTON REMOTE AND MIC

A chip added in the volume control panel automatically switches between Android and iOS operating systems so you can control your music and volume controls according to the device you use.

HIGH-QUALITY TANGLE-FREE SERRATED CABLES

The cable is covered in a high-quality plastic coating and is braided. This ensures that it has a strong tensile strength and your earphones last a long time. The twisted design prevents the earphones from getting tangled.

SOUNDMAGIC'S POINT OF PRIDE: E10

The SoundMAGIC E10C has been awarded the "Best In-Ear Headphones Under £50" by WhatHi-Fi consistently from the year 2011 till the year 2016.

title: Headphone Zone - SmartCase
description:
DESCRIPTION
When you fumble for your earphones, they have chances of getting entangled, grimy and dirty because of the way they are placed in your bag - they are hard to find when you are in a hurry.
We know you are on the go all the time, be it traveling across states, or just commuting across streets. Hence, we give you the SmartCase to carry your earphones smartly everywhere. It guards, carries, stores and protects your earphones from dirt and grime, and keeps them untangled. Also, the silicone build of the SmartCase makes it easy to FIT ANYWHERE!
Presenting Headphone Zone's SmartCase. It keeps your earphones safe, clean and untangled. You can wrap earphones in it and keep them and they don’t budge because the silicone padding around it seals perfectly.
These cases come in a range of vibrant and youthful colour combinations and is perfect for every type of personality out there. Choose your favorite one!

Easy to Use
The SmartCases have a minimalistic design which allows for easy and user friendly usage. All you have to do is wrap the earphones around the lid and then close the lid gently after your earphones have been wrapped and contained in the body.
WATER AND DIRT PROOF
The silicone encasing is dirt resistant and doesn’t allow your earphones to be bothered by surrounding grime. Also, it is splash-proof and perfect for carrying them around during the Indian monsoon.

EASY TO LOCATE
The build and the size of the SmartCase is such that it makes it easy for you to locate it among a number of other things in your bag.
VIBRANT COLOURS
The SmartCases come in a range of vivacious and youthful colours that match each personality and their mood. You can either go for the quirky combinations or the calmer solid ones, whatever suits your personality best! Choose from colours like black, white, blue, green, yellow and pink.

title: Schiit - Eitr
description:
Designed & Made in the USA

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Connect With USB 2.0

Metal Build

DESCRIPTION

WORKS WITH MOST USB DEVICES

Turn any device into a dedicated, high-performance audio source with the Schiit Eitr. All you need to do is to connect your PC, phone or streamer to its USB input and a DAC to its coaxial SPDIF output for complete isolation along with superb bit depths and sample rates up to 24/192.

WORKS GREAT, SOUNDS JUST AS GREAT

The Eitr uses the latest high-performance USB input technology — Gen 5. This allows for complete electromagnetic and electrostatic source isolation via transformers along with precision clock sources that operate at multiples of 44.1 and 48kHz. It eradicates the relationship between system power and USB power. All this is manufactured and assembled in the USA.

SPECS

SPECS

USB INPUT
Type B

USB MODE
USB 2.0 (480Mbps), compatible with USB 3/3.1 ports

USB RECEIVER
C-Media CM6631A

USB ISOLATION
Electromagnetic and electrostatic isolation via high-speed transformers

CLOCKS
Separate Crystal Clocks For Both 44.1kHz and 48kHz multiples

SPDIF OUTPUT
1 coaxial (RCA) output

AC POWER
9VA 6VAC wall-wart

POWER CONSUMPTION
2.5W typical

453g

title: Chord - DAVE
description:
Designed & Made in the UK

5 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

3-Pin XLR Balanced Output

FPGA DAC Chip

Connect With USB BNC, AES & TOSLINK

Pair with Laptop via USB

6.8v RMS @ 33Ω Power Output

Aluminium Build

Remote Controls

DESCRIPTION

MEET THE MOST ADVANCED DAC/PREAMP AMPLIFIER IN THE WORLD

The Chord DAVE has the very best conversion technology available. It stands for ‘Digital to Analogue Veritas in Extremis’. Experience unrivalled reality and musicality with unmatched response time. It supports up to 768kHz & DSD 512 (Octa-DSD) playback and can drive headphones up to 800Ω. This DAC is the result of over 20 years of R&D.

SPARTAN 6 FPGA DAC FOR BETTER SOUND

The DAVE features the advanced Spartan 6 FPGA (Field Programmable Gate Array) with 1,000 times the processing power (at 164K taps) of the traditional mass-produced DAC. To handle complex timing issues head-on, this FPGA has over a million lines of code. This gives you significantly improved timing, multiple sonic benefits and the best noise-shaper performance of any known DAC.

MULTIPLE CONNECTIVITY OPTIONS

The DAVE can be used as a DAC, Amp or standalone Pre-Amp. It has multiple input options like 4 BNC Coax and 1 Galvanically Isolated Type-B USB Inputs that support up to 768kHz; 2 AES/EBU and 2 optical inputs that support 96kHz as well as Expandable DXO Inputs. You also get Unbalanced RCA, Balanced XLR and ¼" headphone outputs. The included IR Remote & volume controls allow for easy usage.

HIGH-QUALITY, FUNCTIONAL AND DURABLE BUILD

The DAVE uses Chord's famous porthole design which consists of a full-sized LCD display on a solid aluminium chassis, showing sample frequency, volume, input and set-up configuration options. A remote control, as well as the large stainless steel controller and ball buttons on the fascia, makes it easy to use. It comes with a rotary encoder.

SPECS

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
20Hz to 20kHz

THD +N
-127.5dB (AWT)

CHANNEL SEPARATION
125dB @ 1kHz

DYNAMIC RANGE
127.5dB (AWT)

HEADPONE OUTPUT
1% THD 6.8v RMS with 300Ω (154mW) 1% THD 6.8v RMS with 33Ω (1.4w)

OUTPUT IMPEDANCE
0.055Ω (short circuit protected)

OPERATING VOLTAGE
90v AC – 250v AV auto switching 50Hz – 60Hz

DIGITAL INPUTS
4x 75Ω S/PDIF BNC Coax – 44.1kHz to 384kHz

1x AES XLR – 44.1kHz to 96kHz

2x Fibre Optic TOSLINK – 44.1kHz to 96kHz

1x USB Type B – 44.1kHz to 768kHz (16 – 32bit) – PCM and DSD

ANALOGUE OUTPUTS
1x Stereo Pair of Unbalanced RCA

1x Stereo Pair of Unbalanced RCA

1x ¼” TRS Jack Headphone Output

TAP LENGTH FILTERS
164,000

SAMPLE FREQUENCIES
44.1Khz – 768Khz (16 – 32bit) and DSD64 to DSD512 native DSD + DoP (input dependant)

DIMENSIONS
7.8cm (H) 33.5cm (W) 15.2cm (D)

WEIGHT
5kg

IN THE BOX

2. DAVE Quickstart guide

3. Safety instructions

4. 10A Mains IEC cable

5. IR Remote control

6. Type-A USB to Type-B USB cable

7. Optical cable

8. 2x AAA batteries

title: Sony - MDR-XB55AP
description:
Designed in Japan

Extra Bass Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Commuting

Ideal for Taking Calls

Ideal for the workplace

12mm Neodymium Driver

Works with Android & iOS

Tangle-Free Cables

Super Lightweight Design

The Sony MDR-XB55AP has been made keeping only and only one thing in mind - to give people the biggest and deepest bass possible in a earphone below Rs. 2000/- Highly recommended for EDM, Bollywood and Hip-Hop lovers.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

12mm NEODYMIUM DRIVERS WITH BASS DUCTS

The MDR-XB55AP is built with 12mm Neodymium magnets that give you an exceptionally powerful sound. Its powered bass ducts have also been specially designed for extra deep bass.

STYLISH DESIGN. SNUG FIT. SUPERIOR COMFORT.

The MDR-XB55AP metallic colored earpieces give them a modern look and feel. The earbuds have been designed to snugly fit inside your ear canal. They stay put and lend you added comfort even during long hours of music listening.

UNIVERSALLY COMPATIBLE REMOTE

The in-line mic and remote control let you navigate quickly with the multi-function button. With this, you can switch between your music and calls with ease on both iOS and Android devices.

ONE LESS THING TO WORRY ABOUT

Immerse yourself directly in your music without wasting time untangling cable knots. The MDR-XB55AP's cables have a serrated flat design. This makes them tangle-free and ready to use whenever you need it.

SMARTKEY APP FOR CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION

Life just got simple with the Smart Key App. You can personalize these Sony Earphones with this by configuring your mic button to choose from Volume control or track control functions. The app is available on Play Store and is compatible with Android 4.0 and above.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Sony MDR-XB55AP and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period on all Sony products is 1 year from the date of purchase. In order to claim warranty, please visit our Sony warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

How does the Sony - MDR-XB55AP deliver that strong punchy bass?

The Sony MDR-XB55AP is part of the XB series which stands for extra bass that gives you that head-bobbing bass driven sound perfect for EDM, Pop, and Bollywood.

Does the Sony - MDR-XB55AP come with a mic?

Yes, it comes with an in-line remote and mic so you can take calls anywhere.

Will the extra bass affect the overall clarity of the music?

Let’s just say that these Sony earphones are meant for loud thumping music thanks to its powerful bass ducts. If you prefer listening to every detail in your music, you should probably consider looking for a more balanced pair.

Do the Sony - MDR-XB55AP get tangled?

Thanks to the serrated flat cords the earphones do not get tangled easily.

Which devices could you use with Sony - MDR-XB55AP?

You can use this headphone with any device having 3.5mm jack which is universally found in all mobile and laptops as well as musical devices.

What is the sound signature of the Sony - MDR-XB55AP

The MDR-XB55AP is built with 12mm Neodymium magnets that give you an exceptionally powerful sound. Its powered bass ducts have also been specially designed for extra deep bass.

Is the Sony - MDR-XB55AP compatible with my Android device?

Yes, it works with all Android and iOS devices that support a 3.5mm jack except for Nexus phones.

Which Comply eartips will be compatible with the Sony - MDR-XB55AP?

Comply - Audio Pro will be the perfect match for your Sony - MDR-XB55AP

Does the carry pouch helps?

Yes, the carry case not only protects your earphones but also makes carrying them without tangling or damaging them.

title: Schiit - Jotunheim 2
description:
Designed & Made in the USA

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

5 Years of Warranty

Metal Build

Dual AKM AK4490 DAC Chip

XLR Balanced Output

DESCRIPTION

WELCOME TO JOTUNHEIM

Why buy a desktop system that will get outdated within a few years? The Schiit Jotunheim is meant to say 'goodbye' to this. You can use it as an internal DAC, amp or a phono preamp as well as upgrade it to anything else whenever needed. It's ready to handle sensitive IEMs, power-hungry headphones and powered desktop monitors with 5W output into 32 ohms from the balanced outputs.

JUST THE WAY YOU LIKE IT

Tailor your Jotunheim exactly according to your needs. Pick the Multibit DAC Module to get Schiit’s multi-bit DAC architecture & unique digital filter or the AK4490 DAC Module for a world-class delta-sigma DAC or even MM Phono Input Module, for passive RIAA, 42dB of gain & great phono sound.

EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE, ALWAYS

The Jotunheim's gain stage is unique. Without using summers or splitters, it offers a balanced and single-ended output thanks to its inherently balanced & fully discrete current feedback topology. You get the advantage of constant, low feedback throughout the audio band with its wide bandwidth and excellent measured performance. The bottom line? Superb performance from each input & output.

SPECS

TOPOLOGY

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS
Schiit - Jotunheim

FAQs

I thought you guys said you’d never do a DAC/Amp!

This isn’t a DAC/amp. This is a configurable desktop control center.

But if you choose the DAC card, it’s a DAC/amp!

Yep, it is. And if you choose a different card, or no card, it’s a phono/amp or just an amp/preamp. The main point is that it doesn’t have to be a DAC/amp.

I don’t see the difference.

Here’s the difference: buy a DAC/amp that isn’t modular and upgradable, and you’ll be chucking it in the can in a couple of years when digital technology changes. With Jotunheim, you just swap in a new DAC card. Or decide, “heck with it, let’s do phono now.” Or never have a DAC. Or never have a phono. It’s up to you…and it’s updatable for the future…and it’s got a modular slot that, well, who knows what we’ll decide to put in it next?

But you said amp/DACs were inferior!

Nope. We said we didn’t like combined products due to obsolescence, and we didn’t like a noisy DAC section sharing power supplies with an amp. We killed the obsolescence issue with modular architecture, and we’ve gone to huge lengths to isolate the Jotunheim’s amp section from digital noise, including RF-suppressing, 4-layer board layout and multiple isolated, regulated supplies. Boom. Problems solved.

Holy hell, this thing is cheap for a real balanced differential amp/DAC!

Well, maybe not in the grand scheme of things. I mean, you can get a decent laptop for what Jotunheim costs. But yes, we are very proud of the value we’ve been able to pack into Jotunheim. An all-new, proprietary Pivot Point™ differential discrete topology, multiple switchable inputs and preamp outputs, balanced and single-ended headphone outs, a big 27mm Alps 4-gang balanced pot, and an optional differential DAC module with passive filtering. And a ton of power. And a 5-year warranty. And…but we’re getting tedious, aren’t we?

But this is probably a “fake” balanced amp, right, where you convert from balanced to single-ended and back again?

Nope. When we say, “balanced, differential,” we say what we mean, and mean what we say.

Wait a sec, there are a lot of combined amp/DACs out there using op-amps and digital volume, or converting to single-ended internally, or all of the above, that cost a whole lot more than this, right?

Right.

Aaaannd?

And they ain’t Schiit.

So, if we get a DAC module, is this an amp/DAC or DAC/amp?

Yes.

And how did you achieve this magical no-compromise bullschiit?

By not simply sticking a headphone amp chip in a DAC or sticking a half-assed DAC in a headphone amp. Used as a DAC, it operates no differently than Bifrost or Gungnir—but with the added functionality of a volume control, and, of course, a headphone output.

So I can use this as just a DAC?

Sure. If you get one of the optional DAC modules.

What’s the difference between the DAC modules?

$100.

Sheesh. Besides that, what’s the difference between the DAC modules?

Okay, we’ll be serious. You can choose one of two different DAC modules for Jotunheim: Multibit DAC Module. This one uses Schiit’s unique DSP-based digital filter and true multibit DAC architecture, with the AK5547 D/A converter. It’s essentially a Modi Multibit with only USB input. AK4490 DAC Module. This one uses two AK4490 DACs (hardware-balanced configuration) for excellent measured performance at low cost.

Or can I use it as just an amp?

Yep, you can do that too. You can also use it as a great preamp. And you can even use it as a phono preamp with the phono input card. You just can’t have both DAC and phono at the same time, sorry.

What is this “Pivot Point topology?”

It’s a new, Schiit-proprietary, differential current-feedback topology that provides exceptional performance—low distortion, high bandwidth, inherently balanced output, and the ability to use one side of the topology as a single-ended output, to eliminate the need for summers. It’s also fully discrete, with no op-amps (except the DC servo) or integrated “chip” outputs, and is completely DC-coupled from input to output. It is, quite simply, the highest-performing, most flexible gain stage we’ve ever created. And it’s like nothing else out there.

So it’s not a circlotron?

No. It is inherently differential and balanced, but it is not a circlotron, nor is it supersymmetric. Beyond that, buy one and reverse-engineer it, like any other company with no imagination.

I’m frustrated! I want to know everything about this magic gain stage!

Go to college. Learn engineering. Be nice. Stop by at shows. Then maybe we’ll tell you more.

You’re screwing with me!

Yep. We probably won’t tell you anything, even at shows. Yes, I know, we’re dinosaurs in this open-source age.

Hey, this isn’t the same old Schiit chassis you’ve been using forever. What gives?

Oh, you noticed. This new, more efficient chassis is sleeker than our previous products, isn’t it? It’s also a big part of the Jotunheim’s attractive price. We’re not about putting the same old stuff in bejeweled boxes. In this case, there’s a whole lot of insanely-new-and-cool stuff in a very simple, affordable box.

What’s Jotunheim in Norse mythology?

It’s the land of the giants. Which we believe is very appropriate for this all-new concept. But you tell us…

WARRANTY & MEDIA REVIEWS

5 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Schiit Jotunheim comes with a 5 year warranty from Schiit that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Schiit's warranty in India.

This is what SYS stands for. The Schiit SYS, simply put, is a 2-way switch and potentiometer. This preamp contains neither the electronics nor the power you find in other Schiit products. But, thanks to this, you get absolutely no distortion.

CONNECTS & SWITCHES BETWEEN ANY LINE-LEVEL SOURCE

Pair your DAC with a powered monitor or phono preamp and crank up the volume with the SYS. Need to use two sources with a Schiit amplifier? No worries. This preamp can switch between devices with ease. It can connect to just about any line-level source including PCs, iPods, Macs, DVD Players, tuners, etc.

Hey, this is cool! Can I use it between my DAC and a pair of powered monitors?

Yep, that's exactly what it's meant for

How about if I have a CD player, too?

Sure. Add it as a second input, and you can switch between them. Double the fun!

How about a phono preamp?

Yep, that works too. As do iPods, iPads, computers, Android phones, iPhones, Android tablets, Windows computers, Mac computers, DVD players, Blu-ray players, cassette players, tuners, digital radio receivers, or anything else with line-level output.

Can I use it with a power amp?

Absolutely, you can use SYS to connect two sources to any power amp with RCA inputs, and control the volume.

Hey, I just want a switch, not volume control.

Turn the volume all the way up and use the switch.

Hey, I just want volume control, not a switch.

Then just use one input.

Hey, can you use this in reverse to switch 1 input to two outputs?

Yes, with the volume all the way up. But why not just use RCA Y-cables or splitters, like these?

Okay, let's be serious. This is one cheap little gadget. What's the downside?

The downside to a passive preamp is exactly that—it's passive. That means there are no electronics in it. Which means it can't drive really long cable runs. If you're expecting to run 35' RCA cables to your power amp, Sys isn't going to be the best option. If you're running 6' cables to desktop speakers, that's not a problem. We'd be careful with anything longer than 15' on Sys, depending on the cable type.

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS
Schiit - Jotunheim

FAQs

I thought you guys said you’d never do a DAC/Amp!

This isn’t a DAC/amp. This is a configurable desktop control center.

But if you choose the DAC card, it’s a DAC/amp!

Yep, it is. And if you choose a different card, or no card, it’s a phono/amp or just an amp/preamp. The main point is that it doesn’t have to be a DAC/amp.

I don’t see the difference.

Here’s the difference: buy a DAC/amp that isn’t modular and upgradable, and you’ll be chucking it in the can in a couple of years when digital technology changes. With Jotunheim, you just swap in a new DAC card. Or decide, “heck with it, let’s do phono now.” Or never have a DAC. Or never have a phono. It’s up to you…and it’s updatable for the future…and it’s got a modular slot that, well, who knows what we’ll decide to put in it next?

But you said amp/DACs were inferior!

Nope. We said we didn’t like combined products due to obsolescence, and we didn’t like a noisy DAC section sharing power supplies with an amp. We killed the obsolescence issue with modular architecture, and we’ve gone to huge lengths to isolate the Jotunheim’s amp section from digital noise, including RF-suppressing, 4-layer board layout and multiple isolated, regulated supplies. Boom. Problems solved.

Holy hell, this thing is cheap for a real balanced differential amp/DAC!

Well, maybe not in the grand scheme of things. I mean, you can get a decent laptop for what Jotunheim costs. But yes, we are very proud of the value we’ve been able to pack into Jotunheim. An all-new, proprietary Pivot Point™ differential discrete topology, multiple switchable inputs and preamp outputs, balanced and single-ended headphone outs, a big 27mm Alps 4-gang balanced pot, and an optional differential DAC module with passive filtering. And a ton of power. And a 5-year warranty. And…but we’re getting tedious, aren’t we?

But this is probably a “fake” balanced amp, right, where you convert from balanced to single-ended and back again?

Nope. When we say, “balanced, differential,” we say what we mean, and mean what we say.

Wait a sec, there are a lot of combined amp/DACs out there using op-amps and digital volume, or converting to single-ended internally, or all of the above, that cost a whole lot more than this, right?

Right.

Aaaannd?

And they ain’t Schiit.

So, if we get a DAC module, is this an amp/DAC or DAC/amp?

Yes.

And how did you achieve this magical no-compromise bullschiit?

By not simply sticking a headphone amp chip in a DAC or sticking a half-assed DAC in a headphone amp. Used as a DAC, it operates no differently than Bifrost or Gungnir—but with the added functionality of a volume control, and, of course, a headphone output.

So I can use this as just a DAC?

Sure. If you get one of the optional DAC modules.

What’s the difference between the DAC modules?

$100.

Sheesh. Besides that, what’s the difference between the DAC modules?

Okay, we’ll be serious. You can choose one of two different DAC modules for Jotunheim: Multibit DAC Module. This one uses Schiit’s unique DSP-based digital filter and true multibit DAC architecture, with the AK5547 D/A converter. It’s essentially a Modi Multibit with only USB input. AK4490 DAC Module. This one uses two AK4490 DACs (hardware-balanced configuration) for excellent measured performance at low cost.

Or can I use it as just an amp?

Yep, you can do that too. You can also use it as a great preamp. And you can even use it as a phono preamp with the phono input card. You just can’t have both DAC and phono at the same time, sorry.

What is this “Pivot Point topology?”

It’s a new, Schiit-proprietary, differential current-feedback topology that provides exceptional performance—low distortion, high bandwidth, inherently balanced output, and the ability to use one side of the topology as a single-ended output, to eliminate the need for summers. It’s also fully discrete, with no op-amps (except the DC servo) or integrated “chip” outputs, and is completely DC-coupled from input to output. It is, quite simply, the highest-performing, most flexible gain stage we’ve ever created. And it’s like nothing else out there.

So it’s not a circlotron?

No. It is inherently differential and balanced, but it is not a circlotron, nor is it supersymmetric. Beyond that, buy one and reverse-engineer it, like any other company with no imagination.

I’m frustrated! I want to know everything about this magic gain stage!

Go to college. Learn engineering. Be nice. Stop by at shows. Then maybe we’ll tell you more.

You’re screwing with me!

Yep. We probably won’t tell you anything, even at shows. Yes, I know, we’re dinosaurs in this open-source age.

Hey, this isn’t the same old Schiit chassis you’ve been using forever. What gives?

Oh, you noticed. This new, more efficient chassis is sleeker than our previous products, isn’t it? It’s also a big part of the Jotunheim’s attractive price. We’re not about putting the same old stuff in bejeweled boxes. In this case, there’s a whole lot of insanely-new-and-cool stuff in a very simple, affordable box.

What’s Jotunheim in Norse mythology?

It’s the land of the giants. Which we believe is very appropriate for this all-new concept. But you tell us…

WARRANTY & MEDIA REVIEWS

5 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Schiit Jotunheim comes with a 5 year warranty from Schiit that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Schiit's warranty in India.

description:
Designed in Romania

Everything that I love about the Meze 99 Classics, but at a more affordable price point. Thats the 99 Neo. And I absolutely love them. Its also tuned with a more laidback and warmer sound for a more modern signature.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

A HEADPHONE THAT'S JUST AS SPECIAL AS YOU

The Meze 99 Neo is beautiful. Made from cast zinc alloy with a coal-black electroplated coating, it combines a contemporary black look with the best of the materials. The thickly padded memory earcups make a product that not only looks luxurious but also makes you feel special.

40MM NEODYMIUM MAGNETS FOR A RICH, BALANCED SOUND

A 40mm Neodymium magnet is placed on the side of each earcup and is designed to resonate in harmony providing a nice and wide soundstage. Rather than resorting to artificially tuned frequencies, the drivers provide dynamic contrast for a more natural listening experience.

COMFORTABLE FOR LONG LISTENING SESSIONS

Meze has done exhaustive research in order to find the right material and technology for each component of the 99 Neo. To combat discomfort of any kind, the manganese spring steel headband delivers even pressure for any head size. The earcups consist of memory foam earpads and soft PU leather making these perfect for long listening sessions.

BUILT TO BE STYLISH AND DURABLE

The headphones have cast zinc alloy hardware with an electroplated coating, stamped manganese spring steel headband and internal components are made of durable ABS and silicone parts. Construction uses no glue, just nuts and bolts. The cables are made with kevlar fibres, thereby combining the best of craftsmanship and sturdiness.

SERVICEABLE IN EVERY PART

The Meze 99 Neo is built to last you generations with its replaceable parts and sturdy build. Besides the usual warranty that every brand offers, the 99 Neo's parts are endlessly serviceable. Each component can be easily substituted for another. So, if any part of the headphone is damaged you can simply replace it instead of going for a new pair of headphones.

What is the warranty period on the Meze 99 Neo?

The warranty period on all Meze products is 1 years. For more warranty details click here.

Will you need an amp along with a Meze 99 Neo?

The Meze 99 Neo will not usually need an amp, but if you are a bass lover then you will love the extra oomph an amp can add.

Is the Meze - 99 Neo foldable?

No. But the wires are detachable to easily port them anywhere. (Even into the galaxies if you may!)

Does Meze 990 Neo come with a mic?

Yes, the Meze 99 Neo does come with a mic and 1-Button remote.

How is the overall fit?

Meze 99 Neo Pro comes with an adjustable headband so that it firmly and comfortably cradles your head.

Which devices are compatible with the Meze - 99 Neo?

The Meze - 99 Neo are compatible with all Android and iOS devices that have a 3.5mm audio jack slot.

Is the carry case provided with the Meze - 99 Neo?

Yes it does come with a EVA carry case for comfortable portability and protection from damaging the headphones.

description:
DESCRIPTION

SPORT PRO & AUDIO PRO

The Sports Ear-tips lets you do your workouts and long runs comfortably without the hassle of slipping out. They are also sweat proof and hence you don't have to worry anymore about the wearing out of your earphones due to your extreme workout sessions. Do you have to commute daily into those crowded public transports and listen to people's voices between your favorite songs? The Comply Isolation is your solution. As it not only protects from outside noise and leaks into your ears but also doesn't let your music leak into the outside world.

ISOLATION SO GOOD, IT OUTPERFORMS DIGITAL NOISE CANCELLATION

Comply Foam Tips offer excellent noise isolation. Actual attenuation depends on earphone design and frequency. The foam's passive noise-reduction technology seals out unwanted ambient sound and funnels pure music directly into the ear canal.

COMPLY'S BODY HEAT TECHNOLOGY FOR A DYNAMIC FIT

The Foam tips are designed to be sleek and tapered to provide easy insertion and stability in the ear canal. The tips are heat-sensitive and breathable, conforming to the dynamic shape of your ear canal, thereby fitting perfectly.The tips are heat-sensitive and breathable, conforming to the dynamic shape of your ear canal, thereby fitting perfectly. These foam tips are designed for long-term, comfortable wear.

SOFT POLYURETHANE MATERIAL FOR EXTRA COMFORT

Made from extremely soft polyurethane, these foam tips are designed for long-term, comfortable wear. Being thirty times softer than the silicone used on ordinary, Comply Foam Tips are extraordinarily comfortable, reducing irritation and fatigue and leaving listeners with clear, crisp sound.

ERGONOMIC SPHERICAL SHAPE FOR EASIER INSERTION

The spherical shaped ear-tips are easy to insert and 30 times softer than silicone ear-tips which especially designed for music lovers, everyday listening, conference calls, travelers for long and comfortable wear because it reduces irritation and fatigue leaving listeners with clear, crisp sound. The audio pro has a perfect canal seal that enhances the sound of bass Maximizing music listening experience.

MAXIMIZE COMFORT, MINIMIZE FREQUENCY LOSS

On testing, there was no noticeable reduction in the frequency response when Comply Foam Tips were tested against ordinary silicone tips. *Testing performed using a pure tone frequency sweep from 200Hz-8000Hz.

SWEAT GUARD FOR ADDED HYGIENE AND PROTECTION

The Sports' Foam tips are built for highly active people and athletes. The Sport series of earphone tips are porous and therefore breathable. It is specially designed to stay in the ear canal during intense workout. It won’t slip out! It is specially designed to stay in the ear canal during intense workout.

SMARTCORE™ FOR BETTER FIT, SOUND AND COMFORT

SmartCore foam ear-tips are specially designed for athletes, audio enthusiasts, and casual music lovers who are on the go and all day listeners. SmartCore foam ear- tips are 30 times softer than silicone, and can be worn all day without inconvenience because they offer better sound, fit, and comfort. SmartCore™ fits on sound port nozzles with a 0.19” - 0.24” (4.8mm - 6.3mm) diameter therefore flexible for any type of earphone.

title: Audeze - Leather Care Kit
description:
DESCRIPTION

PROTECT YOUR LCD HEADPHONES

Keep your Audeze headphones looking as good as new with the Audeze LCD Leather Care Kit. This kit is designed to remove the dust, oil and dirt that attaches itself to the ear pads and the headpad due to regular use. The cleanroom-quality Class 100 wipes are machine-washable and can be reused.

HIGH-QUALITY INGREDIENTS TO KEEP YOUR LCD EARPADS & HEADBANDS SAFE

Unlike regular leather conditioners that use toxic chemicals to cut costs, the special Audeze conditioner uses natural elements such as: Lanolin: A highly effective emollient that forms a protective film to keep the leather from drying. It has been derived from refined and purified sheep’s wool. Aloe Vera: Is used with coconut oil to repair the leather and preserve its texture. It nourishes the leather fibres for a longer life and a softer feel. It is known as one of nature’s best moisturizers. Beeswax: Has excellent restorative properties. It is an expensive byproduct of honey production.100 pounds of honey produce only 1 to 2 pounds of beeswax. Carnauba Wax: Is sourced from the Carnauba palm tree growing in northeastern Brazil. The leaves are first collected, then dried and beaten to loosen the wax before being refined into the finished product. Note: While the conditioner is perfect to revitalise the leather headband and earpads, it can cause damage to non-leather bands and pads.

In the Box

BOX CONTENTS
1. 2 Fl. oz. (59 ml) bottle of premium leather conditioner

2. 2 x Machine-washable, cleanroom-quality Class 100 wipes

title: STAX - SRM-007tII
description:
Designed in Japan

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

DESCRIPTION

PURE BALANCE AMPLIFIER, OUTSTANDING CLEAR SOUND & SUPPORTS HIGH-RESOLUTIONS FILES

Unlike other amplifiers, the SRM-007tll consists of a pure balance amplifier in which the XLR balance input does not have to pass through a transformer or inversion amplifier. It is the only system that makes it possible to listen to sound in the most ideal manner permitted by the balance system. The use of on-inductive coil resistance realises straightforward properties that take advantage of the fitted vacuum tubes and audio with outstanding quality and high level of clarity. STAX has ensured that SRM-007tll has put in great efforts into the circuit constants. Thus, it achieves a higher grade of reproductivity for SACD and other new generation audio formats.

SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR STAX ‘EARSPEAKERS’, ULTRA THIN POLYMER FILM & XLR AND ALL ANALOG VOICE INPUTS

The SRM-007tll has been exclusively designed for earspeakers characterized by their wide high dynamic range and outstanding operating features. Thus, pair your headphones with the SRM-007tll and enjoy the best that the world of music has to offer. Fitted with an ultra-thin polymer film, the SRM-007tll, lets you listen to music with an unprecedented response and a high degree of resolution. Experience your music in its most natural form. The high-quality sound quadruple volume unit makes it possible for XLR input as well as all kinds of line-level analogue voice inputs.

SPECS

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS
1. STAX SRM-007tII

FAQs

What sort of device is the STAX SRM-007tll? Why do I need it?

The STAX SRM-007tll is a driver unit. A driver unit is like an amplifier. It converts electrical signals from your audio player into music when it reaches your headphones. It is mainly used for headphones and earphones that have a high impedance. Find out more here.

What are electrostatic earspeakers?

Electrostatic earspeakers are headphones that run on special electrodes that conduct electricity. Since, these produce a sound that is only comparable with other loudspeakers (& not other headphones), they are known as earspeakers. Sounds cool right?

What is the warranty like and whom should I contact?

STAX offers a manufacturer’s warranty of 1 year. In case you need to claim warranty or want to read more about it, here’s the place you need to be.

title: Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO
description:
Designed & Made in Germany

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

45mm Dynamic Tesla Drivers

The DT 1990 PRO were made to be an open back reference for the very best studios in the world. But they're so good that audiophiles can't get enough of them for their home listening! They certainly sound way better than their price would indicate.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

BRINGING THE TESLA TO THE STUDIO

The DT 1990 PRO is perfect for mixing and mastering in the studio. Professional users all around the world have placed their trust in Beyerdynamic studio headphones. They remain the number one choice for music producers, sound technicians and broadcast users and are a firmly established piece of equipment in studios worldwide.

OPEN-BACK DESIGN FOR AN EFFORTLESS SOUND

Natural and exceptionally spatial sound is achieved thanks to the open-back circumaural design. The optimized spatial sound reproduction makes the DT 1990 PRO headphones a reliable reference for mixing and mastering applications as well as for critical listening. Power and precision are critical requirements when it comes to sound reproduction. Brilliant highs, a richly detailed mid-range and precise bass combine to ensure sublime sound quality that is second to none.

MAXIMUM COMFORT, MINIMUM DISTORTION

The perfected design of the DT 1990 PRO combines innovation with decades of expertise in headphone technology. High-tech textiles and memory foam filled ear pads ensure exceptional wearing comfort. Headphones are so comfortable you almost forget you are wearing them.

45mm DYNAMIC NEODYMIUM TESLA DRIVERS

The DT 1990 PRO has Beyerdynamic's exclusive Tesla technology to thank for its balanced sound profile – combining high levels of efficiency with distortion-free sound reproduction across all signal levels. The titanium-coated acoustic fabric means that every knob movement on the mixing desk is audible. Subtle variations can be picked up like an acoustic magnifying glass.

RUGGED BUILD AND REPLACEABLE COMPONENTS

The DT 1990 PRO is very durable. The headband has been constructed from steel and replaceable headband pads that are high on comfort for long listening sessions. All components are replaceable and ensure a long lifetime of the headphone.

TWO PAIRS OF EARPADS, TWO SOUNDS

Two pairs of ear pads are included in order to achieve the ideal sound characteristic depending on the use case. Velour ear pads provide an open sound and are perfect for mixing and mastering. A pair of leatherette ear pads provide a more closed sound making the headphones more well suited to monitoring applications.

A PLETHORA OF ACCESSORIES

The headphones come with two detachable cables, one straight and one coiled; a premium protective carry case, two sets of velour & leatherette earpads and two gold-plated ¼-inch headphone jack adapters.

Specs

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

DRIVERS
45 mm

DRIVER TYPE
Tesla Driver

MAGNET
Neodymium

IMPEDANCE
250Ω

SENSITIVITY
102 dB @ 1 kHz

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
5Hz - 40,000Hz

MAX INPUT POWER
200 mW

CONTROLS & CONNECTIVITY

WIRED CONNECTIVITY
3.5mm

MICROPHONE
No

COMPATIBILITY
Universal

DESIGN & BUILD

WEARING STYLE
Over-ear

WEIGHT
370g

GRILL
Closed Back

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS

1. Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO Headphones

2. Two pairs of velour ear pads

3. Two pairs of cables(3 m straight and coiled cable)

4. Jack Adapter 6.35mm

5. Premium hard case

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

What is the difference between DT 1990 Pro and Amiron Home?

As a reference headphone for studio applications, the DT 1990 PRO features an accurate resolution and a differentiated stereo image. With a detailed reproduction of highs, it is the ideal tool for a precise analysis of the audio material to be processed. The Amiron home unfolds its full potential mainly at home. It combines a very precise bass with transparent mids and pleasantly clear highs. Its warm, laid-back sound with a fascinating spaciousness is excellently suitable for a relaxed listening to the music and provides a top-class audiophile listening experience..

Which plug is used for the detachable cable of DT 1770 / 1990 Pro?

This is a three-pin mini-XLR connection, the male part in the left earcup, the female one on the cable. Pressing the small button on the female plug unlocks the connection. The pin assignment is as follows: (3) - left hot, (2) - right hot, (1) - common return. The other end of the cable is equipped with a stereo minijack (1/8") with a screwable 1/4" adapter.

What's the difference between the DT 770/990 Pro and the DT 1770/1990 Pro?

The DT 770/990 PRO is made for musicians, sound engineers, producers as well as beginners looking for a reliable, sturdy and affordable pair of headphones as a working device. The DT 1770/1990 PRO was developed for sound engineers, producers, and musicians looking for a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

What do "Impedance" and "Ohms" mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Ω, 32 Ω, and 80 Ω are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Ω are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Ω like the T 1.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 1990 Pro model gives a warm and smooth sound.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 1990 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a open-back over-the-ear headphone which makes listening to music better since it gives that natural sound output.

How is the overall fit of Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO?

Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 Pro fits over the ear and has plush earpads, making it a comfortable headphone to wear for long hours at a stretch.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO have detachable cables?

Yes, the cables are indeed detachable. Making for easy storage and convenient for whenever you want replace or upgrade cables.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO work well and loud enough with mobile phones ?

It gives enough output to be loud but then it also depends on your phone's internal amp and DAC

Are the DT 1990 PRO good for long useage?

Yes, you can use the DT 1990 Pro for a long time as it comes with high-tech textiles, and memory foam filled ear pads ensure exceptional wearing comfort.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO need an Amplifier?

Yes, since it has a high impedence which cannot be driven by a smartphone an Amp gives it the extra boost to the sound.

WARRANTY AND MEDIA REVIEWS

2 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Beyerdynamic DT 1990 PRO comes with a 2 year warranty from Beyerdynamic that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Beyerdynamic's warranty in India.

Read More

Read More

Read More

Read More

"Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 PRO's sparkling highs, tight bass and detail retrieval make it great value for money for those looking for audiophile headphones that sound great with all types of music."
Read More

"Beyerdynamic’s implementation of their Tesla design also shows technical prowess. The DT1990 PRO kick fast, woo with speed and attack and top it off with great separation and fine details."
Read More

"Like an absolute tank: Hand built in Germany at the Heilbronn factory. The 1990s are among the three newest 600-dollar, 250-ohm full-size Tesla headphones."
Read More

title: MITER - Chord - Mojo Single + iPhone 6/7 Leather Case
description:
DESCRIPTION
Chord Mojo is the ‘Led Zeppelin’ of the music world and therefore deserves the best treatment. The MITER case for the Mojo single is handmade in Korea with excellent craftsmanship and great attention detail. With its ergonomic design, the case is a beauty with brains as it protects DAC/AMP from shocks, fingerprints, and scratches. The case includes two small straps plus a magnetic strip to keep the Mojo locked in place. The inside is also lined with soft material to keep it safe and sound. What’s unique about this case is that it accommodates both the iPhone 6/7 and the Chord Mojo in the same case. It adds to the portability of the mojo for a worry-free music experience on-the-go.
The case has a patented stand case cover and a sturdy steel frame which adds to the uniqueness and durability of the case and the Mojo. Made with black, soft full grain leather, the case not only looks classy but also fulfills its main purpose of protecting the DAC/AMP from damage.
Because your Mojo and iPhone deserve a ninja for protection!
Superior Premium Materials
The Black case is made with Soft FG Leather that is used in high-quality football shoes that are roughly used. You can, therefore, be ensured that the leather is high quality and durable.
Handcrafted in Korea
The MITER cases are handcrafted in Korea with great attention to detail by using premium quality leather and patented designs to make your case one of a kind, durable and classy.
High-Quality Protection from Shock, Fingerprints, and Scratches
The durable MITER cases protect your precious player from all things bad that could happen to your player. They protect the player from shock, fingerprints, and scratches so that you can have your music on the go without any worries.
Patented Steel Frame & Case Cover
MITER cases have a patented design for the steel frame and case cover because your unique music deserves a unique case.
Perfect Fit for your Mojo
They are custom made just for the Chord Mojo and prove to be the perfect fit just for your player.
sku: MITER - Chord - Mojo Single + iPhone 6/7 Case Single Leather Case - Black

The SoundMAGIC E10-series have been an award-winners for 6 years straight. Plug them in, and you'd know that right off the bat. A robust metal build, universally flexible remote and sound fine-tuned for the masses. They sound MAGIC.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

UNBOXED

Headphone Zone Certified Unboxed Units
Unboxed units are as good as new products with the product's packaging being unavailable. These products give you the same satisfaction of new products - but at down-to-earth prices. DESCRIPTION

BETTERMENT OF THE BEST: THE E10C

The SoundMAGIC E10c has been designed and modeled on its predecessor the award-winning E10. Retaining everything from sound, to build and quality. The E10c offers an in-line microphone and remote that offer universal compatibility and works with Apple and Android alike.

10MM DYNAMIC DRIVERS FOR AWARD-WINNING SOUND QUALITY

Experience detailed high-quality sound with the SoundMAGIC E10C's 10mm dynamic drivers. With a powerful, precise and natural sounding bass, these in-ears sound exceptional with any music genre. Choose the right fitting eartip to experience sound output.

LIGHTWEIGHT METAL AND DURABLE CONSTRUCTION

Inspite of its all-metal construction, the E10C is extremely lightweight and comfortable. The vibrant colours this earphone comes in makes it look stylish. Just take them out of your bag and heads are sure to turn.

UNIVERSALLY COMPATIBLE 3-BUTTON REMOTE AND MIC

A chip added in the volume control panel automatically switches between Android and iOS operating systems so you can control your music and volume controls according to the device you use.

HIGH-QUALITY TANGLE-FREE SERRATED CABLES

The cable is covered in a high-quality plastic coating and is braided. This ensures that it has a strong tensile strength and your earphones last a long time. The twisted design prevents the earphones from getting tangled.

SOUNDMAGIC'S POINT OF PRIDE: E10

The SoundMAGIC E10c has been awarded the "Best In-Ear Headphones Under £50" by WhatHi-Fi consistently from the year 2011 till the year 2016.

SPECS

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

DRIVERS
10mm

Dynamic

IMPEDANCE

100dB/mW @ 1KHz (+/- 2dB)

Neodymium

Yes

3. Double flange silicone tips

4. Cable clip

5. Carrying case

WHAT YOU WILL NOT GET
1. Original packaging of SoundMAGIC E10C Earphones

FAQs

What is the sound signature of Soundmagic E10C?

The Soundmagic E10C comes with a v-shaped sound signature, it tends to deliver an equal amount of bass and trebles that adds excitement and is enjoyable.

Is the SoundMAGIC - E10C compatible with all devices?

Yes, it works with all Android and iOS devices that support a 3.5mm jack.

Does the SoundMAGIC - E10C have noise cancellation?

Nope, it doesn’t, most earphones will have noise isolation based on their in-ear fit and the E10C has a pretty good comfortable ergonomic design. You could still hear that loud commuter screaming at his phone, but a bit reduced.

Does the SoundMAGIC - E10C come with a mic?

The Soundmagic - E10C comes with a three-button mic and remote for a on the go control.

Which Comply series will work with my SoundMAGIC - E10C?

The Comply - Audio Pro is compatible with your SoundMAGIC - E10C

Does the SoundMAGIC - E10C require an Amp?

As it has a high impedance of 46 Ohms so it will work perfectly fine with your smartphones and laptops. A little amplifications hasn’t hurt anyone, though. Would recommend you to get the Shanling - UP2 for your SoundMAGIC - E10C

Is the SoundMAGIC - E10C best earphones under Rs. 2000?

If you're looking for the best value in terms of sound, design and comfort, you should check out our buying guide for the best earphones under Rs. 2000 to make the best choice.

Will the SoundMAGIC - E10C get tangled?

The cables are made of Twisted-Pair Hifi Cable which makes it tangle-free. One less thing to worry about.

What is the purpose of the cellphone and computer adapter provided in the box?

To make sure sure they can be used in airplanes, computers and mobile phones when a minor compatibility issue is encountered.

WARRANTY AND MEDIA REVIEWS

1 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this SoundMAGIC E10C (Unboxed) comes with a 1 year warranty from SoundMAGIC that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about SoundMAGIC's warranty in India.
