title: Schiit - Valhalla 2
description:
Designed & Made in the USA

5 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Connect With RCA

300mW RMS @ 300Ω Power Output

Metal Build

Volume Controls

DESCRIPTION

DO THE UNIMAGINABLE

Most tube OLT amplifiers are created solely to drive power-hungry headphones. The Schiit Valhalla 2 isn't that. It can be used with sensitive, lower-impedance headphones as well. You can use it with Grados, AKGs and various IEMs. You may even like it with high-efficiency planars like the LCD-X, LCD-XC, Oppo PM-1 and HE-400.

NOT YOUR AVERAGE TUBE AMP

Add some "tube magic" to your powered monitors with the Valhalla 2's preamp outs. You can match your headphone's output and impedance to this amplifier easily with the gain switch. Spoiler Alert: The Valhalla 2 is exceptionally accurate, resolving and neutral. It does not have that syrupy, pleasing coloured tube sound.

SPECS

SPECIFICATIONS

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
20Hz-20Khz, -0.1db, 7Hz-200KHz, -3dB

MAXIMUM POWER
300mW RMS per channel at less than 10% THD (300 ohms) 340mW RMS per channel at less than 10% THD (600 ohms)

THD
< 0.02%, 20Hz-20KHz, at 1V RMS, low gain, 600 ohms

IMD
< 0.03%, CCIF at 1V RMS low gain, 600 ohms

SNR
98db, unweighted, referenced to 1V RMS, low gain

CROSSTALK
< -71dB, 20 Hz-20KHz

OUTPUT IMPEDANCE
14 ohms (hi gain), 3.5 ohms (lo gain)

INPUT IMPEDANCE
100K ohms

GAIN
7 (16.9db) or 1.5 (3.5 db), via rear switch

TOPOLOGY
All-triode, noninverting, single voltage gain stage, current source biased front end and optimized WCF output stage, DC-coupled input

TUBE COMPLEMENT
6N1P dual triode input, 6N6P dual triode output, 1 each per channel. 6N1Ps rollable to 6DJ8, E88CC, 6922, 6BZ7, and similar types.

POWER SUPPLY
Two internal power transformers with over 2,000uF of filter capacitance

POWER CONSUMPTION
40W

SIZE
9 x 6 x 3.25”

WEIGHT
3.17kg (7 lbs)

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS

1. Schiit Valhalla 2

2. Power cord

3. Stick-on feet

FAQs

Wait, wait, wait. low impedance headphones on an OTL tube amp? Are you nuts?

No, not completely. At typical listening levels, with high efficiency headphones, the low output impedance and higher current capability of Valhalla 2 mean you might be surprised by the sound.

What makes Valhalla 2 different than most tube amps?

We infuse each of the electrons in Valhalla with special powertrode ions, which gives the output super-strength. Each milli-amp of current in Valhalla is actually worth many amps of current in other amps.

Are you done now? Want to give us a real answer about how you made Valhalla 2 the “super OTL” amp?

Okay, fine, we’ll take our pills. Ahem. There’s really no magic. We just spent a long time optimizing both the input and output topology to maximize current delivery, and to reduce output impedance. This entailed quite a few tweaks to the common-cathode front end, adding a new negative voltage rail and current source to up the overall gain, and also changes to the White cathode follower output.

Hey, you’re making that up, too!

No, actually, we aren’t. To really understand our serious answers, you’ll need to learn engineerese, I’m afraid.

So what does that mean?

In simpler numbers: 2-8x lower output impedance, 8x lower distortion, 2x more current delivery, and lower noise. In simpler terms: while Valhalla was marginal-to-bad with IEMs and low-impedance headphones, Valhalla 2 is better. It’s not the be-all and end-all, but it’s now a much more well-rounded amp.

What headphones are Valhalla really good for?

Valhalla is still going to be at its best with high-impedance headphones like the 300 ohm Sennheisers and 250-600 ohm Beyers. With up to 60V p-p output capability, it can light up high-impedance headphones.

Does the volume control adjust the preamp outputs?

Yes.

Can I turn off the headphone outs when I’m using the preamp outputs?

The preamp outputs are automatically turned off when you plug in your headphones. Unplug your headphones to use the pre outs.

How do I switch the gain?

There’s a toggle switch on the back of the amp.

Is Valhalla rollable?

Yes! The standard 6N1P input tubes can be subbed out for any 6DJ8/6922/ECC88/ECC85/6BZ7 types, including NOS, cryo-treated, voodoo-blessed, hand-assembled by elves, etc.

Does this have a muting relay, like all your other amps?

No. The slow turn-on and turn-off characteristics of tubes and limited current capability means there's no muting relay—which is the same for pretty much every tube OTL headphone amp out there. While there is DC on the output at turn-on and turn-off, it is on the order of 100mV into 32-ohm headphones. If you are concerned about this, unplug your headphones before turning the amp off, and wait 30 seconds or so after you turn Valhalla 2 on to plug in.

I was told that tube amps are all about euphonic distortion and that you’re a bunch of crazy money-grubbing arseholes because you make tube amps.

Have you ever heard a tube amp?

No, seriously.

We are serious. Have you ever heard a tube amp?

No, I don’t find it necessary, having done the calculations for exact current and voltage delivery to my headphones to achieve a long-term safe listening level, and knowing the distortion floor of my particular transducers—

Okay, we see where this is going. Bottom line, we make both highly-capable, completely-neutral-by-the-measurements, inexpensive solid state amps, and wacky tube and tube hybrid amps. Why? Because some people like solid state, and some people like tubes. You know, like some people like Camrys and some like Corvettes. Like some people like Budweiser, and some people like Bordeaux. Amazing thing, the world, full of so many different experiences and so many different opinions of them. Is one right, and another wrong? If so, who is the arbiter? Bottom line, if you don’t agree with our approach, there are tons of other options out there. Have fun, and we hope you find one that fits your desires perfectly.

WARRANTY & MEDIA REVIEWS

5 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Schiit Valhalla 2 comes with a 5 year warranty from Schiit that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Schiit's warranty in India.

"The Valhalla 2 imparts a sense of beauty to the sound of well-recorded acoustic instruments. It's more organic and full-bodied, which is, the way those instruments sound in real life."
Read More

title: Schiit - RCA PYST
description:
PYST stands for Put Your Schiit Together, a set of short cables that make stacking your DAC and amp easy.
The Schiit - RCA PYSTs are about 6 inches long, excluding connectors. They're ideal for stacking a headphone amplifiers and DACs like the Bifrost and Asgard 2.

title: Meze - 99 Classics
description:
Designed in Romania

Warm & Smooth Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Taking Calls

Closed-Back Design

Works with Android & iOS

Replaceable Cables

These were my first pair of serious Headphones. I would listen to every genre track on them. It's gorgeous to look at, and sounds better than anything else in the segment. They're timeliness. I hope to hand them to my kids someday.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

A HEADPHONE AS UNIQUE AND AWESOME AS YOU!

Experience pure luxury in terms of looks and sound with the Meze 99 Classics. This headphone has been lovingly handcrafted from wood and the satin-finished wood grain makes each headphone unique, just like your fingerprint. With these, Meze has worked to change the perception of headphones from being seen as technical devices or cheap plastic accessories to a mature product that you'll fall in love with.

A RICH NATURAL SOUND

Enjoy a crisp, balanced sound with the Meze 99 Classics. The 40mm neodymium drivers offer a clear, undistorted sound. Just sit back and put these on to enjoy the gorgeous sound of plucked strings, upbeat grooves or thumping beats that's natural and lifelike. In addition, the snug medium density memory foam keeps away noise while offering superior noise isolation.

HIGH-QUALITY AND LUXURY IN EVERY ELEMENT

Apart from wood, the 99 Classics also use cast zinc and manganese spring steel. The headband ensures even pressure for long listening sessions. The headpad and earpads are made from PU leather. Everything is then put together using nuts and bolts. This makes the headphone fully serviceable. The entire headphone is made from only premium materials, no glue or plastic.

MADE WITH CARE USING AN EXTENSIVE PROCESS

Each Meze 99 Classics takes almost 45 days to be made. The wood used is harvested from mature trees that have reached the end of their life cycle. This ensures that there is no harm done to the environment while giving you that rich, natural sound. To further enhance the colours, the wood goes through extensive air drying and shaping by hand and CNC machines, a process that takes almost 8 hours. It then goes through sanding, lacquering, finishing, careful inspection and is finally assembled.

Specs

AUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

DRIVERS
40mm

IMPEDANCE
32Ohms

SENSITIVITY
103dB

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
15Hz - 25,000Hz

RATED INPUT POWER
30mW

MAXIMUM INPUT POWER
50mW

CONTROLS & CONNECTIVITY

WIRED CONNECTION
3.5mm

MICROPHONE
Yes

REMOTE
1-Button

COMPATIBILITY
Universal

DESIGN & BUILD

WEARING STYLE
Over-ear

WEIGHT
260g

GRILL
Closed Back

EAR-CUPS
Walnut Wood

CABLE
Kevlar OFC cable

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS

title: Meze - 99 Classics
description:
Designed in Romania

Warm & Smooth Sound Signature

1 Year of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Casual Music Listening

Ideal for Taking Calls

Closed-Back Design

Works with Android & iOS

Replaceable Cables

These were my first pair of serious Headphones. I would listen to every genre track on them. It's gorgeous to look at, and sounds better than anything else in the segment. They're timeliness. I hope to hand them to my kids someday.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

A HEADPHONE AS UNIQUE AND AWESOME AS YOU!

Experience pure luxury in terms of looks and sound with the Meze 99 Classics. This headphone has been lovingly handcrafted from wood and the satin-finished wood grain makes each headphone unique, just like your fingerprint. With these, Meze has worked to change the perception of headphones from being seen as technical devices or cheap plastic accessories to a mature product that you'll fall in love with.

A RICH NATURAL SOUND

Enjoy a crisp, balanced sound with the Meze 99 Classics. The 40mm neodymium drivers offer a clear, undistorted sound. Just sit back and put these on to enjoy the gorgeous sound of plucked strings, upbeat grooves or thumping beats that's natural and lifelike. In addition, the snug medium density memory foam keeps away noise while offering superior noise isolation.

HIGH-QUALITY AND LUXURY IN EVERY ELEMENT

Apart from wood, the 99 Classics also use cast zinc and manganese spring steel. The headband ensures even pressure for long listening sessions. The headpad and earpads are made from PU leather. Everything is then put together using nuts and bolts. This makes the headphone fully serviceable. The entire headphone is made from only premium materials, no glue or plastic.

MADE WITH CARE USING AN EXTENSIVE PROCESS

Each Meze 99 Classics takes almost 45 days to be made. The wood used is harvested from mature trees that have reached the end of their life cycle. This ensures that there is no harm done to the environment while giving you that rich, natural sound. To further enhance the colours, the wood goes through extensive air drying and shaping by hand and CNC machines, a process that takes almost 8 hours. It then goes through sanding, lacquering, finishing, careful inspection and is finally assembled.

Specs

title: Schiit - Vali 2++
description:
Designed & Made in the USA

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

Connect With RCA

1000mW RMS @ 32Ω Power Output

Metal Build

Volume Controls

DESCRIPTION

REDEFINING THE AFFORDABLE TUBE AMP

Some cheap (and even expensive) tube amps don’t use tubes to their full potential, “starving” them with low plate voltages or using op-amp buffers for output. Not the Schiit Vali 2. It uses a unique, class-leading power supply that gives you 60V on the plate. Along with a fully discrete, current-mode noninverting hybrid topology, this amp redefines what you can expect from an affordable tube amp, even at twice its price.

THE POWER TO ROLL YOUR OWN SOUND

The Vali 2 comes with a single NOS 6BZ7 tube, which can be swapped for other Schitt tubes to “roll” the sound to your own preference. It delivers 1W into 32 ohms for hard-to-drive headphones—while providing a low gain mode for low-noise performance with sensitive headphones. You can also use the preamp outputs to add a tube preamp to your power amp or powered monitors.

SPECS

SPECIFICATIONS

FREQUENCY RESPONSE
20Hz-20Khz, -0.2db 5Hz-150KHz, -3dB

MAXIMUM POWER
1300mW RMS per channel (16 ohms) 1000mW RMS per channel (32 ohms) 650mW RMS per channel (50 ohms) 270mW RMS per channel (300 ohms) 270mW RMS per channel (600 ohms)

THD
<0.03%, 20Hz-20KHz, at 1V RMS, low gain

IMD
<0.05%, CCIR, low gain

SNR
99db, unweighted, referenced to 1V RMS, low gain

CROSSTALK
-68dB, 20Hz-20KHz

OUTPUT IMPEDANCE
1.2 ohms in low gain mode, 5.8 ohms in high gain mode

INPUT IMPEDANCE
50K ohms

GAIN
5 (14dB) or 1.25 (2dB)

TOPOLOGY
Tube voltage gain with convolved bipolar current mode inverter and discrete bipolar class AB output stage

PROTECTION
Delayed start and fast shut-down with muting relay

POWER CONSUMPTION
9W

WEIGHT
453g (1 lb)

IN THE BOX

BOX CONTENTS

1. Schiit - Vali 2

2. Wall-Wart

FAQs

What? A Vali 2 with preamp outputs! And more power! And a gain switch! And that allows you to roll tubes, like, externally, like a real tube amp? For only $169?

Yes, we see you have a good grasp of the particulars of this amp. Congratulations! You probably do very well in school.

And this thing is powerful enough for inefficient headphones and quiet enough for IEMs, as in, I can use it with pretty much all of my headphones?

Yes. Pretty much. It may not be ideal, say, for HiFiMan HE-6s, which are very, very hard to drive. Beyond that, yep, it’s a great little tube amp that you can use with almost anything.

And I can connect those preamp outputs to my powered monitors on my desk?

Yep! Or a power amp. It’s a nice little single-input tube hybrid preamp.

Hey, I’m new to tubes, how long do they last?

About 5,000 hours, give or take. Probably longer in Vali 2, since the tubes are run very conservatively. And…don’t panic. Humans lived for decades with only this electronic technology at their disposal. We even went into space and stuff with it.

And when the tube goes bad?

You replace it. We sell single 6BZ7 tubes, matched to 2%, for $10. But there are a lot of other options out there, including 6DJ8, 6922, ECC88, 2492, and even more. Pretty much any tube with a 6DJ8 pinout, 6V heater, and 600mA or less of heater current will work fine in Vali 2. Beyond that, we don't speculate which tubes are "best."

So wait, how do you match a single tube?

Good question! The tubes we use are “double triodes,” meaning they have two triodes per tube (how else could a single tube work in a stereo amp?) The two triodes inside each tube have to be matched for gain, or else there may be some channel imbalance. When you order tubes for rolling, make sure both triodes are matched (some tube resellers call them “sections.”)

Ah, I said I was new to this tube thing, I don’t want to spend megabucks on getting a dozen different tubes to try!

That’s fine. The tubes we supply are very nice. Sit back, relax, and enjoy them!

So you probably cheaped out and left the protection off this amp, or something stupid like that, right?

No. Vali 2 has a relay mute for delayed startup and fast shut-down. You can leave your headphones plugged in all the time.

So how can you deliver those high volts? I bet it’s a switching supply!

Think again. Vali 2’s power supply is 100% linear, with regulation on every voltage rail. A unique wall-wart with 2 AC voltages allows us to provide for the needs of the tube heater, the low-voltage rail for the output, and the high-voltage rail for the tube. You may have noticed the funny DIN-plug connector on the amp. Hey, at least you won’t mistake this wall-wart for anything else!

Hey, you say "exceptional thermal efficiency," but this thing runs warm!

Yes, it does. Welcome to tube amps.

Hey, can you use LISST in this?

Sure you can, but why? Magni 2 Uber is a better, more powerful, and less expensive choice for a solid-state amp.

I heard that ultimate accuracy is the result of exemplary measurements, including vanishingly low THD, low noise, and low output impedance, so I don’t know how this thing can sound very good.

Are you going to let others think for you, or are you going to listen for yourself?

What the hell is Vali?

In Norse mythology, Vali is the son of Odin and the giantess Rindr. There’s this amazing resource called Wikipedia. You may have heard of it.

I want a combined DAC/amp! Why didn’t you put a DAC in here?

We did. It’s just in a different chassis and costs another $99 or $249. It’s called “Modi" or "Modi Multibit." Stack with Vali 2 for a combined tube hybrid DAC/Amp.

WARRANTY & MEDIA REVIEWS

2 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Schiit Vali 2 comes with a 2 year warranty from Schiit that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Schiit's warranty in India.

"To sum this all up, the Schiit Vali 2 is a fun, relatively affordable, little all-arounder. Unpack the box and get great sound, not a lot different than a good solid state amp."
Read More

title: Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO
description:
Designed & Made in Germany

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

Metal Build

Closed-Back Design

Needs Amplification

45mm Dynamic Tesla Drivers

Replaceable Cables

They are very best in studio monitoring from Beyerdynamic. The DT 1770 PRO is a closed-back that serves as a reference in the best studios in the world.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

BRINGING THE TESLA TO THE STUDIO

Taking the Tesla Technology to a studio reference headphone for mixing, mastering and monitoring: the DT 1770 Pro features a modern and elegant design with components including end pieces, yokes, ear cups and headband that are very durable.

DESIGNED FOR STUDIO PROFESSIONALS AND AUDIO ENGINEERS

The DT 1770 PRO is a perfect circumaural headphone for high-end studio use of mixing and mastering. Due to its closed design with a high ambient noise attenuation, it is perfect for users in loud environments such as sound engineers when listening to PA systems or musicians.

MAXIMUM PRECISION, MINIMUM LEAKAGE

The closed-back design offers a wide soundstage and excellent resolution together with a precise, natural bass output making these headphones the top pick for professional studio use. Background noise is effectively suppressed, and leakage minimized thanks to the closed-back design. The DT 1770 Pro walks the fine line between pure flat response and slight boosting in certain frequency ranges to allow for clarity, richness, and depth. The clean highs are balanced with full-bodied, deep bass.

45MM DYNAMIC TESLA DRIVERS

Employing Beyerdynamic's Tesla 2.0 technology for the first time in professional headphones, the drivers utilize a triple layer composite diaphragm to reduce "partial oscillations," which results in a more detailed audio performance.

RUGGED BUILD AND REPLACEABLE COMPONENTS

The DT 1770 PRO is very durable. The headband has been constructed from steel and replaceable headband pads that are high on comfort for long listening sessions. All components are replaceable and ensure a long lifetime of the headphone.

TWO PAIRS OF EARPADS, TWO SOUNDS

Two pairs of ear pads are included in order to achieve the ideal sound characteristic depending on the use case. Velour ear pads provide an open sound and are perfect for mixing and mastering. A pair of leatherette ear pads provide a more closed sound making the headphones more well suited to monitoring applications.

A PLETHORA OF ACCESSORIES

The headphones come with two detachable cables, one straight and one coiled; a premium protective carry case, two sets of velour & leatherette earpads and two gold-plated ¼-inch headphone jack adapters.

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 1770 Pro model gives clean highs along with a deep bass sound.

Will the DT 1770 Pro replace the DT 770 Pro?

Yes, the DT 1770 PRO is an advanced version of the DT 770 PRO, made for audio engineers, producers and musicians who need a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

Which plug is used for the detachable cable of DT 1770 / 1990 Pro?

This is a three-pin mini-XLR connection, the male part in the left earcup, the female one on the cable. Pressing the small button on the female plug unlocks the connection. The pin assignment is as follows: (3) - left hot, (2) - right hot, (1) - common return. The other end of the cable is equipped with a stereo minijack (1/8") with a screwable 1/4" adapter.

What's the difference between the DT 770/990 Pro and the DT 1770/1990 Pro?

The DT 770/990 PRO is made for musicians, sound engineers, producers as well as beginners looking for a reliable, sturdy and affordable pair of headphones as a working device. The DT 1770/1990 PRO was developed for sound engineers, producers, and musicians looking for a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

What do "Impedance" and "Ohms" mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Ω, 32 Ω, and 80 Ω are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Ω are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Ω like the T 1.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 1770 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a closed-back over-the-ear headphone which makes listening to music even better thanks to its natural noise isolation.

How is the overall fit of Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO?

Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 Pro fits over the ear and comes with plush pads, which make it plenty comfortable for the majority of users.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO have detachable cables?

The cables are indeed detachable.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO work well and loud enough with mobile phones ?

It will work, but not well enough to do justice to the product. You would better off using these with a good DAC and Amplifier.

Does the Beyerdynamic - DT 1770 PRO need an Amplifier?

Yes, since it has a high impedence which cannot be driven by a smartphone an Amp gives it the extra boost to the sound

title: Headphone Zone - Omega Headphone Stand
description:
We conducted a survey and found that over 88% of headphone owners didn't have a dedicated place to keep their expensive headphones. While some resigned to seeing their headphones casually strewn over a desk, a large portion of our study showed that headphones are well hidden away from view, either in a drawer, or packed neatly in their hard cases or packaging.
The question was on everyone's mind."How do I make my headphones more accessible?" Headphones are a prized possession and we found that one should take pride in presenting them.
That's when we decided to create the elegant Omega Headphone Stand, a handcrafted wooden stand available in three different wooden finishes: Bamboo, Birch and Walnut.
A Headphone Zone product, we're confident that this stand is definitely going to change the look of your table top.
Handcrafted Luxury
The Omega stand is handcrafted from wood that is sourced from sustainably forested woodland. It is quite heavy to hold and feels durable to the touch.
Shaped like an Omega
The conturing shape of the Omega resembles the natural shape of a human head. This means, that one needn't worry about the headphone's structure being altered or degraded over time.

Fit for all Headphones
All headphones, large or small can enjoy the luxury of this stand. These easily take the weight of all headphones, and also complement most of them.
Rubber Feet for Added Stability
We added in 4 rubber feet - 2 below either end of the stand so the stand becomes practically immovable even if placed at the edge of a desk.
Birch Wood Finish
Birch wood finishes, often a substitute for maple wood, are a very popular craftwood option for its smooth lines and soft colours. It's very easy on the eyes. We love the wonderful fine and uniform texture.
Walnut Wood Finish
This beautiful dark wood stand is easily one of the most alluring. Typically found in music instruments and super plush furniture, walnut is a popular choice for the architecture with fine taste. They'd complement most headphones.

DESCRIPTION

40MM NEODYMIUM DRIVERS TUNED TO PERFECTION

SRH1540 is a pair of premium headphones from Shure which are designed for professionals and personal audio requirements. These closed-back headphones offer excellent acoustic performance, comfort and high-end durability. It features 40 mm neodymium drivers which allows the headphone to deliver an extensive soundstage with extreme clarity in high frequencies and rich low end frequencies.

CIRCUMAURAL CLOSED-BACK DESIGN FOR LONGER LISTENING

SRH1540 consists of Steel driver frame along with a vented center pole piece which not only helps to enhance linearity but also reduces internal resonance so that you can enjoy top class performance at all listening levels. The diaphragm which is used in these headphones is made of APTIV Film that improves linearity and lowers Total Harmonic Distortion (THD).

DETACHABLE KEVLAR™ REINFORCED CABLES

The dual exit oxygen-free copper cable has a Kevlar™ reinforced jacket for superior performance and durability. The gold-plated MMCX connectors also ensure secure connection and detachability for easy storage or replacement.

DURABLE. PORTABLE. SUPREMELY STURDY.

The 2.1m detachable cable provides plenty of length, the replaceable velour ear pads ensure long product life and Shure's promise of excellent quality withstands all the tribulations of day-to-day lives. These headphones come with a hard zippered case that provides protection from the elements and portability.The lightweight construction featuring aircraft-grade aluminum alloy yoke and stainless steel grilles also enhances portability along with durability.

DESIGNED FOR LONGER LISTENING SESSIONS KEEPING YOUR COMFORT IN MIND

These headphones are super light in weight as well as highly durable owing to its aluminum alloy and carbon fiber body. Moreover these headphones come with replaceable Alcantara ear pads which have slow-recovery foam making the headphones uber comfortable to wear. This also leads to effective noise isolation. The adjustable headband is highly padded and is ergonomically designed for comfortable music listening experience.

TWO CABLES OPTIONS AND ACCESSORIES TO CHOOSE FROM

SRH1540 is supplied with a storage case, replacement set of velour ear pads, replacement cable, and threaded adapter ensure years of uninterrupted listening enjoyment. The Kevlar™ reinforced cable provides plenty of length, the replaceable earcup pads ensure long product life and Shure's promise of excellent quality. title: Audeze - LCD-X (Music Creator Special)
description:
Designed & Made in USA

Flat Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

Ideal for Indoor Use

For Studio & Professionals

3 Years Warranty On Driver

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Replaceable Mini XLR Cables

DESCRIPTION

MADE FOR AUDIO PROFESSIONALS

The LCD-X (Music Creator's Special) is thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built using the finest, most luxurious materials combined with cutting-edge planar magnetic technology in California, U.S.A. Audeze made sure that they closely match transducers and even the earpads by leather texture and colour. All the earpads are filled with carefully chosen acoustical foam for the best fit and sound.

EXTENDED FREQUENCIES & LOWER DISTORTION WITH FAZORS

Fazors are special acoustical elements positioned on either side of the magnetic structure. They enhance transparency by affecting the sound waves generated by large planar diaphragms. A few of the benefits include extended frequency response, improved high-frequency extension, and lowered distortion, with better imaging.

AUDEZE'S INNOVATIVE PLANAR MAGNETS

Acoustically engineered for accuracy Audeze’s innovative planar magnetic technology delivers a clear and accurate sound that reveals everything on the recording. The LCD-X (Music Creator's Special) has an efficient push-pull magnetic structure that is specially designed and self-closing. This ensures an acoustically transparent music listening experience. The Double-sided Neodymium magnet arrays deliver a uniform driving force across the entire diaphragm for a near-zero distortion.

PROPRIETARY LOTUS DIAPHRAGM FOR A SMOOTH SOUND

Audeze's proprietary Lotus diaphragm has a printed circuit across most of its surface and is capable of handling maximum continuous operating temperatures of over 400° F. This gives the drivers a smooth, resonance-free frequency response, excellent internal damping, edge damping, very low distortion and an extremely fast transient response.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

ENGINEERED TO PERFECTION

The LCD-X (Music Creator's Special) is thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built using the finest, most luxurious materials combined with cutting-edge planar magnetic technology in California, U.S.A. Audeze made sure that they closely match transducers and even the earpads by leather texture and colour. All the earpads are filled with carefully chosen acoustical foam for the best fit and sound.

title: Audio-Technica - ATH-M40x
description:
Designed in Japan

Flat Sound Signature

3 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Needs Amplification

40mm Dynamic Drivers

Closed-Back Design

Replaceable Cables

DESCRIPTION

PURE. PROFESSIONAL. PERFORMANCE.

The M-Series ATH-M40x professional monitor headphones are tuned flat for incredibly accurate audio monitoring across an extended frequency range. Now enhance your studio experience with superior sound isolation and swiveling earcups for convenient one-ear monitoring.

40MM DRIVERS WITH RARE EARTH MAGNETS AND COPPER-CLAD ALUMINIUM WIRE VOICE COILS

The drivers used in the ATH-M40x are 40mm large and custom made drivers with copper-coated aluminum voice coils and rare-earth magnets. They're fine tuned to deliver a superior sonic experience!

HITS THAT SWEET SPOT FOR BASS

The M40x is tuned flat for incredibly accurate sound monitoring across the entire frequency range spectrum to produce stupendously clear, clean and most of all, balanced. You can distinctly hear bright sounding vocals and instrumentals in a single track - which creates a large sense of scale that’s obviously the exact opposite of cluttered and muddy-sounding audio.

CUTTING-EDGE ENGINEERING AND ROBUST CONSTRUCTION

The M40x, even though made of plastic, is known for its use of high quality textured matte construction and overall solid durability. The Pro grade material has been used for the ear cups as well as the headband.

90° SWIVELING CLOSED-BACK EARCUPS FOR ONE-EAR MONITORING

The cups literally contour your ears and place them inside an air-tight enclosure that feels plush and comfortable. There is no pressure being placed against your ears as a roomy interior is provided. Circumaural design contours around the ears for excellent sound isolation in loud environments.

STRAIGHT AND COILED SINGLE SIDED CABLE OPTIONS

The M40x includes two cable options: 1.2 m - 3.0 m coiled cable and 3.0 m straight cable. The 3m straight single-side cable is designed to make the headphones convenient for studio tracking, mixing and field recording. They are very convenient in terms of usage and make life simple.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Audio Technica ATH M40x and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period is 3 Years from the date of invoice for all M-Series and E-Series (Pro Products). In order to claim a warranty, visit our Audio-Technica warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

For who is the Audio Technica ATH-M40x best suited for?

The Audio Technica ATH-M40x is best suited for those who want professional studio tracking and mixing as well as DJ monitoring.

Are the Audio-Technica - ATH-M40x foldable?

Yes, the ATH-M40x has been meticulously engineered for comfort, convenience, and portability.

Does the Audio-Technica - ATH-M40x come with carry case?

Yes, the Audio-Technica - ATH-M40x does comes with a carry case in the box.

Do I really need an amp though?

We have an article that should help understand why an Amp is important. Read about it here.

What are the cables provided with the ATH-M40x?

The ATH-M40x comes with two cables, a 1.2m-3.0m useful for DJs and the other a 3.0m useful for studio monitoring.

For mixing, which is better, open or closed back headphones?

A closed back headphone is ideally a good choice since it contains the sound within the earpads since they are also over the ear. To understand how they are different from open back read Difference between open back and closed back headphone.

How do the Audio-Technica - ATH-M40x stack up against Ultrasone HFI-450?

Both have their pros and we have actually written a dedicated buying guide to help you understand better. Read it here.

How durable are the Audio-Technica - ATH-M40x?

Since they are made of plastic the headphones are simply acceptable in terms of durability.

Are the Audio-Technica - ATH-M40x good for starting DJs?

Yes, ideally these headphones could work well for the beginner DJ.

title: Audeze - LCD-3
description:
Designed & Made in USA

Balanced Sound Signature

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

3 Years Warranty On Drivers

Open-Back Design

Planar Magnetic Drivers

Needs Amplification

Replaceable Mini XLR Cables

DESCRIPTION

THE MOST TRUSTED HEADPHONE BY AUDEZE

The Audeze LCD-3 is a thoroughly engineered and meticulously hand-built headphone. Its best-in-class accuracy makes it an irreplaceable tool for those requiring the most transparent audio reproduction available. Step into a new world of music, full of rich detail, low-end clarity and overall accuracy.

ENJOY EXTENDED FREQUENCIES & LOWER DISTORTION

The LCD-3 uses Fazors, special acoustical elements positioned on either side of the magnetic structure. They enhance transparency by affecting the sound waves generated by large planar diaphragms. A few of the benefits include extended frequency response, improved high-frequency extension and lowered distortion, with better imaging.

EXPERIENCE AUDEZE'S PROPRIETARY PLANAR MAGNETIC DRIVERS

Rather than use standard headphone drivers that operate like miniature woofers or tweeters, the LCD-3 uses a large, 6.17-square-inch thin-film planar magnetic driver that's embedded with Audeze's proprietary Lotus diaphragm that's thinner than a human hair for fast response times. This gives a smooth, resonance-free frequency response, excellent internal damping, edge damping, very low distortion and extremely fast transient response.

MIX & MASTER ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE

Not everyone can listen to their headphones in an acoustically treated room. With the Audeze Reveal plugin, you can add custom filter presets to all Audeze flagships. Now, mix and master in virtually any location, be it the studio, your home or even on top of an active volcano.

HANDCRAFTED WITH PREMIUM MATERIALS

Made in the USA, the Audeze LCD-3 are handcrafted using high-quality luxurious materials. It features Audeze's tonal balance and powerful bass that beautifully articulates the power and nuance of your favourite music. The gorgeous wooden rings are designed for the audiophile with a discerning ear & style. The real lambskin leather or Microsuede earpads and headband use acoustical foam for the best fit and sound.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Audeze - LCD 3 and how do I claim it?

The warranty period of the Audeze LCD 3 is of 3 years. In order to claim warranty, please visit our Audeze warranty page. We are very helpful guys, just saying.

Where are these headphones made?

Audeze headphones are engineered and handcrafted in the USA to our exacting quality standards.

How is the sound signature of Audeze LCD 3?

It is very hard to describe in words but I can say these headphones still retain the iconic warmth and vibrant presentation that have captivated listeners for more than a decade.

Does the LCD 3 require amplification?

Yes, it does require amplification. You can check out our collection of amplifiers and DACs here and desktop Amps here

Do the LCD 3 come with a travel case?

Yes, it does come with a Ruggedized travel case.

How would you describe the sound of LCD 3?

Luxuriously spacious with warm tonal balance and powerful bass.

Can these headphones be used for Studio purposes?

Yes, they can be used for Mixing & Mastering.

Can the LCD 3 be used in a 3.5mm headphone output?

Yes, you will simply need the 6.5mm to 3.5mm adapter.

Warranty & Media Reviews

3 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Audeze LCD-3 comes with a 3 year warranty on the driver and a 1 year warranty on the rest of the parts. Audeze's warranty covers all manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Audeze's warranty in India.

The ATH-M20x professional studio headphones are a great introduction to the critically acclaimed M-Series line. Modern design and high-quality materials combine to deliver a comfortable listening experience, with enhanced audio and effective isolation. An excellent choice for tracking and mixing.

40MM FINE-TUNED DRIVERS FOR SUPERIOR SONIC EXPERIENCE

The sound signature of the Audio Technica ATH M20x is?

title: Smartwrap
description:
DESCRIPTION
Smartwrap is a simple cord manager made of soft silicone rubber and serves one purpose - preventing tangling of your cords. Available in 6 colours, they make for a useful and neat accessory to your headphones or earphones.

To increase the longevity of your listening gear, it is important that you take good care of the cord. Most times when earphones start malfunctioning, it is because the cable has undergone heavy abuse. Therefore, to keep your cords tangle-free and to make sure that they last longer, choose the pocket-friendly Smartwrap, a smart accessory for all your favourite earphones.
Simple Design

With minimalistic design that would make Jony Ive proud, the Smartwrap is really simple to use. It lets you simply wrap each cord through the slit and then wind the cord around and store away in your bag, pocket or wallet. Never again will your earphones emerge from storage looking like they were hit by a small hurricane!

Made for All

Use your Smartwrap in your favourite colour for any and all earphones that you own. As a bonus, they easily double up as a SmartWrap for any thin wires, like LAN and USB cables.
Specifications

SPECS

SPECIFICATIONS

SIZE
70mm x 25mm x 3.2mm

WEIGHT

description:
Designed & Made in Germany

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Ideal for Indoor Use

Open-Back Design

Needs Amplification

45mm Dynamic Drivers

These are amongst my all time favorites, they shine quite 'bright' on the sound quality front. Highly suited for mixing, they are one of the best studio headphones on the market at the price they retail at.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS, A BENCHMARK FOR STUDIO SOUND

The DT 990 Pro are circumaural headphones that house extremely strong neodymium magnet systems offering highly detailed sound reproduction quality. These open-back studio headphones are a reliable tool for professionals for mixing, mastering and recording purposes. The wide stereo image and three-dimensional sound reproduction make the beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro headphones a loyal companion for producers. Outstanding tonal depth ensures that even small changes in the positioning of the acoustic source can be perceived while mixing.

NATURAL BASS AND TREBLE

The open back design allows the headphones to breathe, which creates beautiful natural sounding music that you are bound to enjoy. These have a special diffuse-field design, that make these quality products apt for studio usage.The diaphragm has been made extremely light for better impulse performance. Also the high quality design only helps in better sonic experience delivering a surreal soundstage experience and natural sound.

OPEN CIRCUMAURAL DESIGN FOR DETAILING

TThe DT 990 Pro features an open-back circumaural over-the-ear design for rich audio performance that's designed for critical listening and a more natural sound stage. This increased efficiency also leaves the DT 990 Pro with greater power reserves for a succinct linear response that is especially suited for high-achieving audio applications where appropriate sonic reproduction is of paramount importance, and dedicated equipment is available such as a headphone amplifier.

ADJUSTABLE HEADBAND, VELOUR EARPADS FOR ADDED COMFORT

Beyerdynamic developed The DT series in order to deliver optimal sound in a wide variety of applications and situations.They're dynamic with their headphone designs well suited for a broad range of environments.

ERGONOMIC AND DURABLE BUILD SHOWCASING 90+ YEARS OF GERMAN EXCELLENCE

The headband has been made with solid spring steel that makes these headphones durable and adds to their comfort feature since they come with two pairs of earpads: Padded faux leather and Velour. The 990 Pro's Soft earpads and adjustable, sliding, earpieces together with a single-sided connecting cable ensure listening comfort during extended periods of use.

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 990 Pro model gives a neutral and clear sound.

Does Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a semi open over-the-ear headphone which gives a slightly increased sound isolation and reduced noise leakage

How is the overall fit?

Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro comes with an adjustable headband so that it firmly and comfortably cradles your head.

Does Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro have detachable cables?

No,it does not have detachable cable.

Which devices are compatible?

The DT 990 Pro is compatible with Android and iOS devices as well as studio monitoring eqiupments.

Is Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro good for long useage?

Yes, due to it being durable, lightweight and soft earpads make music listening for long hours comfortable

Does it need an Amplifier?

Yes, since the driver units are bigger, they will need an amplifier so that the headphones can performance to its full potential.

Which hard case can I buy for my Beyerdynamic - DT 990 Pro?

You can get the Beyerdynamic - DT Hard Case for your DT 990 Pro.

Why isn't there a 600-ohms version of DT 990 Pro?

Since most headphone output in professional environments isn't designed for 600-ohms headphones, Beyerdynamic only offers headphones with a maximum impedance of 250-ohms.

What is the technical difference between DT 880/990 edition and DT 880/990 Pro?

The Pro series is designed for professional users and the Edition series are designed for end users. Also, the Pro and Edition series do not differ noticeably in terms of sound provided that they have the same impedance (e.g. the 250 ohms DT 880 Edition and the 250 ohms DT 880 Pro sound the same).

How does the Tygr 300 R differ from the DT 880 Pro and the DT 990 Pro?

The DT 880 PRO has a very linear frequency response, while the DT 990 PRO has a slightly more accentuated bass and accordingly more present trebles for a pleasant balance. Both are primarily designed for studio applications. The TYGR 300 R focuses on gaming. Powerful bass and detailed accentuated treble go very well with gaming. However, the sound design of the DT 990 PRO has been further optimized for gaming, sometimes through the use of a special acoustic fleece.

How can I tell what the impedance of my DT 770/880/990 Edition is?

You check the impedance of the integrated sound transducers from the connection plug. The impedance is sometimes hot-embossed onto the plastic shaft of the plug: If there is nothing there, the model has an impedance of 250 ohms. If it reads 32 Ω, the model has an impedance of 32 ohms. If it reads 600 Ω, the model has an impedance of 600 ohms.

What do "impedance" and "ohms" mean?

Impedance is the so-called alternating-current resistance that headphones have under specific standard conditions. On devices with low output impedance, headphones are the louder, the lower their impedance is. In principle, we recommend that you choose headphones with low impedance for use on devices that are operated by battery/rechargeable battery (i.e. most portable devices such as smartphones, tablet computers but also notebooks). You can distinguish between high and low impedance. Usually, the gradations 18 Ω, 32 Ω, and 80 Ω are used in the low range. In the high range, 250 Ω are common. If you want to get the most out of your system (and it has the power to do so), choose a model with 600 Ω like the T 1.

Are the DT 990 Pro Available with less headband pressure?

No, the professional headphones are only available with the defined headband pressure. If the headband pressure is too strong for you, you can slightly try to expand the installed spring steel in the headband. For this purpose, we recommend stretching the headphones gradually for a few hours over books or similar. You should choose the width a little bit wider than the width of your head.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION

EARMARKED AS 'THE STUDIO LEGEND'

Beyerdynamic developed The DT series in order to deliver optimal sound in a wide variety of applications and situations. They're dynamic with their headphone designs well suited for a broad range of environments. The DT 880 PRO are ideal for mixing, editing and mastering purposes. The unaltered neutral sound, top-notch stereo imaging, and the extremely high resolution make the Beyerdynamic DT 880 PRO studio headphones a top pick studio use. With the detailed stereo imaging, they help professionals pick up on errors immediately making them ideal for mixing and mastering.

ADJUSTABLE HEADBAND, VELOUR EARPADS FOR ADDED COMFORT

Soft earpads and adjustable, sliding, earpieces together with a single sided connecting cable ensure listening comfort during extended periods of use. Durability of the DT 880 Pro is unquestionable thanks to its spring steel headband. They are built to withstand the long hours at the studio and tantrums on the stage.

NATURAL SOUND AND SUPERIOR SONIC EXPERIENCE

The semi-open back design allows the studio headphones to create natural sounding music.The diaphragm has been made extremely light for better impulse performance. An extremely strong neodymium magnet system offers the DT 8800 highly detailed sound reproduction quality, and is mechanically very robust. This increased efficiency also leaves the DT 880 with greater power reserves for succinct linear response that is especially suited for high-achieving audio applications where appropriate sonic reproduction is of utmost importance, and dedicated equipment is available such as a headphone amplifier.

SEMI-OPEN, SPACIOUS AND TRANSPARENT SOUNDSTAGE

The DT 880's semi-open, over-the-ear design offers slightly increased sound isolation and reduced noise leakage, while retaining the high fidelity normally associated with open-back studio headphones. The semi open back also lets the studio headphones breathe which make the sound reproduced natural sounding and enhance it to a great extent.

The old guard of studio headphones, DT 770 PRO has a sound that stands the test of time making it a worthy consideration for home and studio use. Albeit the old school design, it has very good comfort, supreme isolation and a clean sound quality.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! DESCRIPTION

SETTING THE BENCHMARK FOR STUDIO HEADPHONES

The Beyerdynamic DT 770 PRO is built as an ideal studio monitoring headphone suitable for the most demanding professional and audiophile applications such as for recording studios, post-production or broadcasting situations.

LOVED BY PRODUCERS, MIXING ENGINEERS, SOUND ENGINEERS AND AUDIOPHILES ALIKE

Beyerdynamic DT770 Pro studio headphones have set an industry benchmark for reference audio sound and accurate sound reproduction. They are loved by music enthusiasts, music producers, sound engineers and broadcasters all over the world. These studio headphones are used in all the studios and have a great response towards the entire frequency range. It also delivers punchy detail in low frequency music.

YOUR STUDIO ON THE GO

DT770 Pro would never let you compromise with the studio sound you prefer to listen to, you can just hold them up and take them where you want.

CHOOSE THE RIGHT VARIANT FOR YOU

32Ω - The highly optimized 32 ohms variant is used for regular casual listening over laptops and smartphones. 80Ω - The 80 ohms is a wide choice for a range of studio applications. It is the most commonly used variant. 250Ω - The 250 ohms are more suitable for mixing and recording in the studios with audio interfaces and mixing desks.

EXCELLENT IMPULSE RESPONSE WITH A CLEAN SOUND

These studio headphones deliver a top-notch impulse response and exceptional isolation in a perfectly neutral listening environment. The high frequencies have detailed and differentiated sounds whereas the ultra-low bass sounds are defined and crispy.

SUPREME COMFORT WITH SUPERIOR VELOUR EARPADS

The DT 770 PRO comes with velour earpads while the 32 Ohm Limited Edition variant comes with leatherette earpads which is meant for long hours of wearing. The inner headband softly sits on the head and the nominal pressure of the headband is approx. 3.5 N which in simple terms means it gives adequate comfort.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 770 Pro model comes with a bass heavy and a clean powerful sound.

Are the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro ideal for DJs?

No, they are not. You can have a look at the V-MODA Crossfade LP2 as it is ideal for DJ and live shows.

Is the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro open-back?

No, it does not come with open-back design. If you are looking for a wide soundstage our top recommendation will be the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro. It features an open-back design with much more detailing as compared to the DT 770 PRO.

Does Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a closed-back over-the-ear headphone which makes listening to music even better thanks to its natural noise isolation.

How is the overall fit?

Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro fits on the ear so don't go expecting the earcups to envelop your ears in lush comfort.

Does Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro have detachable cables?

No, Unfortunately it does not come with a detachable cable feature.

Do you need an Amplifier for 80 Ohms or 250 Ohms?

Yes, since the driver units are bigger, they will need an amplifier so that the headphones can performance to its full potential.

How do these stack up against Ultrasone Performance 820?

Apart from both these headphones being able to be driven easily by your smartphones it is also a choice between a warm and smooth sound against a balanced sound. Read more comparison between the two headphones here

Will the DT 1770 Pro replace the DT 770 Pro?

No, the DT 1770 Pro is an upgraded version of the DT 770 PRO, made for audio engineers, producers, and musicians who need a pair of high-end studio headphones without compromising on performance in all the aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories. The DT 770 Pro is for beginners who want a reliable, robust, and affordable pair of headphones to work with.

What is the difference between Pro and edition models of DT 770, DT 880, and DT 990?

The Pro series is designed for professional users and the Edition series are designed for end users. Also, the Pro and Edition series do not differ noticeably in terms of sound provided that they have the same impedance (e.g. the 250 ohms DT 880 Edition and the 250 ohms DT 880 Pro sound the same).

Which hard case can I buy for my DT 770 Pro?

You can get the Beyerdynamic - DT Hard Case for your DT 770 Pro.

Why isn't there a 600-ohms version of the DT 770 Pro models?

In professional environments most headphone outputs aren't designed for 600-ohms headphones, we only offer headphones with a maximum impedance of 250-ohms.

Why does my DT 770/990 Pro have another connection cable with a smaller thread?

In order to be able to plug the headphones with the 3.5 mm jack (unscrewed jack adapter) into a mobile device with a bumper, the M8 thread, which was previously available, was converted to a smaller M5 thread. If your headphones have such an M5 thread you will need an adapter. If you own an M8 threaded jack adapter you can still use it for your headphones, but only as a plug adapter.

What's the difference between the DT770/990 Pro and the DT 1770/1990 Pro?

The DT 770/990 Pro is made for beginners musicians, sound engineers, producers who are looking for a reliable, sturdy, and affordable pair of headphones as a working device. The DT 1770/1990 Pro was developed for sound engineers, producers, and musicians looking for a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.

description:

DESCRIPTION

ON-EAR, CLOSED BACK DESIGN FOR COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE

The EPOS PC 8 USB is an amazing pair of portable entertainment headphones. Extremely easy to use, you simply have to plug and play and there are no other intricacies. These headphones offer a wonderfully rich natural sound and are engineered in a closed back, on ear design. The headband is of a very light build, hence it doesn't disturb you when you are in the middle of a long conversation. The closed-back designs allow for more isolation, resulting in a very detailed sounding reproduction of your music.

NOISE-CANCELLING MICROPHONE AND STEREO EAR-PIECES FOR FOCUSED COMMUNICATIONS

The Noise-cancelling Mic filters out all the ambient noise for you to Skype with friends around the world and be rest assured that they can hear you loud and clear. The earpieces are laid out in a stereo setting offering you stereo audio. The combination of these earpieces and microphones ensures focused communication.

USB PLUG AND PLAY

Since the EPOS PC 8 comes with a USB connector, it can be used with a PC, Laptop and even your Macbook! It allows for fast plug and play connection via the USB port. These features make the PC 8 a high quality headset for Internet telephony, that you will not want to miss.

HANDY VOLUME CONTROL, MUTE FUNCTION AND EASY SWING MICROPHONE

You get an in-line volume control switch which allows you to adjust the volume control, along with a microphone mute function. so you don't have to access computer settings to adjust anything. The Microphone only moves 180 degrees vertically, giving you the option of getting it out of your way when you're aren't using it.

title: Beyerdynamic - DT 770 PRO
description:
Designed & Made in Germany

Flat Sound Signature

2 Years of Warranty

Ideal for Audiophiles

For Studio & Professionals

Closed-Back Design

Needs Amplification

45mm Dynamic Drivers

The old guard of studio headphones, DT 770 PRO has a sound that stands the test of time making it a worthy consideration for home and studio use. Albeit the old school design, it has very good comfort, supreme isolation and a clean sound quality.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.

DESCRIPTION

SETTING THE BENCHMARK FOR STUDIO HEADPHONES

The Beyerdynamic DT 770 PRO is built as an ideal studio monitoring headphone suitable for the most demanding professional and audiophile applications such as for recording studios, post-production or broadcasting situations.

LOVED BY PRODUCERS, MIXING ENGINEERS, SOUND ENGINEERS AND AUDIOPHILES ALIKE

Beyerdynamic DT770 Pro studio headphones have set an industry benchmark for reference audio sound and accurate sound reproduction. They are loved by music enthusiasts, music producers, sound engineers and broadcasters all over the world. These studio headphones are used in all the studios and have a great response towards the entire frequency range. It also delivers punchy detail in low frequency music.

YOUR STUDIO ON THE GO

DT770 Pro would never let you compromise with the studio sound you prefer to listen to, you can just hold them up and take them where you want.

CHOOSE THE RIGHT VARIANT FOR YOU

32Ω - The highly optimized 32 ohms variant is used for regular casual listening over laptops and smartphones. 80Ω - The 80 ohms is a wide choice for a range of studio applications. It is the most commonly used variant. 250Ω - The 250 ohms are more suitable for mixing and recording in the studios with audio interfaces and mixing desks.

EXCELLENT IMPULSE RESPONSE WITH A CLEAN SOUND

These studio headphones deliver a top-notch impulse response and exceptional isolation in a perfectly neutral listening environment. The high frequencies have detailed and differentiated sounds whereas the ultra-low bass sounds are defined and crispy.

SUPREME COMFORT WITH SUPERIOR VELOUR EARPADS

The DT 770 PRO comes with velour earpads while the 32 Ohm Limited Edition variant comes with leatherette earpads which is meant for long hours of wearing. The inner headband softly sits on the head and the nominal pressure of the headband is approx. 3.5 N which in simple terms means it gives adequate comfort.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro?

The warranty period on all Beyerdynamic products is 2 years. For more warranty details click here.

How is the overall sound of Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro?

Beyerdynamic is a German brand that has made its mark as a fine headphone manufacturer and the DT 770 Pro model comes with a bass heavy and a clean powerful sound.

Are the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro ideal for DJs?

No, they are not. You can have a look at the V-MODA Crossfade LP2 as it is ideal for DJ and live shows.

Is the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro open-back?

No, it does not come with open-back design. If you are looking for a wide soundstage our top recommendation will be the Beyerdynamic DT 990 Pro. It features an open-back design with much more detailing as compared to the DT 770 PRO.

Does Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro come with a mic?

No, the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro does not come with a mic since it is more of a studio monitoring headphone.

Is Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro an over the ear or on the ear product?

It is a closed-back over-the-ear headphone which makes listening to music even better thanks to its natural noise isolation.

How is the overall fit?

Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro fits on the ear so don't go expecting the earcups to envelop your ears in lush comfort.

Does Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro have detachable cables?

No, Unfortunately it does not come with a detachable cable feature.

Do you need an Amplifier for 80 Ohms or 250 Ohms?

Yes, since the driver units are bigger, they will need an amplifier so that the headphones can performance to its full potential.

How do these stack up against Ultrasone Performance 820?

Apart from both these headphones being able to be driven easily by your smartphones it is also a choice between a warm and smooth sound against a balanced sound. Read more comparison between the two headphones here

Will the DT 1770 Pro replace the DT 770 Pro?

No, the DT 1770 Pro is an upgraded version of the DT 770 PRO, made for audio engineers, producers, and musicians who need a pair of high-end studio headphones without compromising on performance in all the aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories. The DT 770 Pro is for beginners who want a reliable, robust, and affordable pair of headphones to work with.

What is the difference between Pro and edition models of DT 770, DT 880, and DT 990?

The Pro series is designed for professional users and the Edition series are designed for end users. Also, the Pro and Edition series do not differ noticeably in terms of sound provided that they have the same impedance (e.g. the 250 ohms DT 880 Edition and the 250 ohms DT 880 Pro sound the same).

Which hard case can I buy for my DT 770 Pro?

You can get the Beyerdynamic - DT Hard Case for your DT 770 Pro.

Why isn't there a 600-ohms version of the DT 770 Pro models?

In professional environments most headphone outputs aren't designed for 600-ohms headphones, we only offer headphones with a maximum impedance of 250-ohms.

Why does my DT 770/990 Pro have another connection cable with a smaller thread?

In order to be able to plug the headphones with the 3.5 mm jack (unscrewed jack adapter) into a mobile device with a bumper, the M8 thread, which was previously available, was converted to a smaller M5 thread. If your headphones have such an M5 thread you will need an adapter. If you own an M8 threaded jack adapter you can still use it for your headphones, but only as a plug adapter.

What's the difference between the DT770/990 Pro and the DT 1770/1990 Pro?

The DT 770/990 Pro is made for beginners musicians, sound engineers, producers who are looking for a reliable, sturdy, and affordable pair of headphones as a working device. The DT 1770/1990 Pro was developed for sound engineers, producers, and musicians looking for a pair of high-end studio headphones with uncompromising performance in all relevant aspects such as sound, design, comfort, and accessories.
